title: Dedekind-cut construction of real and complex numbers

blocks.name: cnpi
blocks.content: The set of positive integers, which is the set of natural numbers ` _om ` with 0 removed. _Note: This is the start of the Dedekind-cut construction of real and_ _complex numbers. The last lemma of the construction is_ ~ mulcnsrec . _The actual set of Dedekind cuts is defined by_ ~ df-np .

df-ni
blocks.content: Define the class of positive integers. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. (Contributed by NM, 15-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-pli
blocks.content: Define addition on positive integers. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. (Contributed by NM, 26-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-mi
blocks.content: Define multiplication on positive integers. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. (Contributed by NM, 26-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-lti
blocks.content: Define 'less than' on positive integers. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. (Contributed by NM, 6-Feb-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: ltsopi
blocks.content: Positive integer 'less than' is a strict ordering. (Contributed by NM, 8-Feb-1996.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jul-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm ltsopi() {
  |- wor(clti, cnpi)
} = {
  mpbir(wor(clti, cnpi), wor(cep, cnpi))
  mp2(wor(cep, cnpi), wss(cnpi, con0), wor(cep, con0))
  eqsstri(cnpi, con0, cdif(com, csn(emptycls)))
  df-ni()
  sstri(cdif(com, csn(emptycls)), con0, com)
  difss(com, csn(emptycls))
  omsson()
  ax-mp(wor(cep, con0), wwe(cep, con0))
  epweon()
  weso(cep, con0)
  soss(cnpi, con0, cep)
  bitr4i(wor(clti, cnpi), wor(cep, cnpi), wor(cin(cep, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), cnpi))
  ax-mp(wb(wor(clti, cnpi), wor(cin(cep, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), cnpi)), wceq(clti, cin(cep, cxp(cnpi, cnpi))))
  df-lti()
  soeq1(clti, cin(cep, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), cnpi)
  soinxp(cep, cnpi)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ltsopi() {
  ⊢ < ≺ ℕ+
} = {
  mpbir(< ≺ ℕ+, ∈ ≺ ℕ+)
  mp2(∈ ≺ ℕ+, ℕ+ ⊆ On, ∈ ≺ On)
  eqsstri(cnpi, con0, (_om \ { ∅ }))
  df-ni()
  sstri((_om \ { ∅ }), con0, com)
  difss(com, { ∅ })
  omsson()
  ax-mp(∈ ≺ On, ∈ ≤ On)
  epweon()
  weso(cep, con0)
  soss(cnpi, con0, cep)
  bitr4i(< ≺ ℕ+, ∈ ≺ ℕ+, (∈ ⋂(ℕ+ × ℕ+))≺ ℕ+)
  ax-mp((< ≺ ℕ+ ↔(∈ ⋂(ℕ+ × ℕ+))≺ ℕ+), < =(∈ ⋂(ℕ+ × ℕ+)))
  df-lti()
  soeq1(clti, (∈ ⋂(ℕ+ × ℕ+)), cnpi)
  soinxp(cep, cnpi)
}

thm dmaddpi() {
  |- wceq(cdm(cpli), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cdm(cpli), cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cdm(cres(coa, cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), cin(cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cxp(con0, con0)))
  eqtri(cdm(cres(coa, cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), cin(cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cxp(con0, con0)), cin(cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cdm(coa)))
  dmres(coa, cxp(cnpi, cnpi))
  ineq2i(cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cdm(coa), cxp(con0, con0))
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(coa), cxp(con0, con0)), wfn(coa, cxp(con0, con0)))
  fnoa()
  fndm(coa, cxp(con0, con0))
  dmeqi(cpli, cres(coa, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)))
  df-pli()
  mpbi(wceq(cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cin(cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cxp(con0, con0))), wss(cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cxp(con0, con0)))
  ax-mp(wss(cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cxp(con0, con0)), wa(wss(cnpi, con0), wss(cnpi, con0)))
  mpbir(wa(wss(cnpi, con0), wss(cnpi, con0)), wss(cnpi, con0))
  sstri(cnpi, con0, com)
  eqsstri(cnpi, com, cdif(com, csn(emptycls)))
  df-ni()
  difss(com, csn(emptycls))
  omsson()
  anidm(wss(cnpi, con0))
  xpss12(cnpi, con0, cnpi, con0)
  dfss(cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cxp(con0, con0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dmaddpi() {
  ⊢ dom(+ℕ)=(ℕ+ × ℕ+)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(dom(+ℕ), (ℕ+ × ℕ+), dom((+o |`(ℕ+ × ℕ+))), ((ℕ+ × ℕ+)⋂(On × On)))
  eqtri(dom((+o |`(ℕ+ × ℕ+))), ((ℕ+ × ℕ+)⋂(On × On)), ((ℕ+ × ℕ+)⋂ dom(+o)))
  dmres(coa, (ℕ+ × ℕ+))
  ineq2i((ℕ+ × ℕ+), dom(+o), (On × On))
  ax-mp(dom(+o)=(On × On), +o[Fn](On × On))
  fnoa()
  fndm(coa, (On × On))
  dmeqi(cpli, (+o |`(ℕ+ × ℕ+)))
  df-pli()
  mpbi((ℕ+ × ℕ+)=((ℕ+ × ℕ+)⋂(On × On)), (ℕ+ × ℕ+)⊆(On × On))
  ax-mp((ℕ+ × ℕ+)⊆(On × On), (ℕ+ ⊆ On ∧ ℕ+ ⊆ On))
  mpbir((ℕ+ ⊆ On ∧ ℕ+ ⊆ On), ℕ+ ⊆ On)
  sstri(cnpi, con0, com)
  eqsstri(cnpi, com, (_om \ { ∅ }))
  df-ni()
  difss(com, { ∅ })
  omsson()
  anidm(ℕ+ ⊆ On)
  xpss12(cnpi, con0, cnpi, con0)
  dfss((ℕ+ × ℕ+), (On × On))
}

blocks.name: addclpi
blocks.content: Closure of addition of positive integers. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm addclpi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wcel(co(c0, cpli, c1), cnpi))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c0, cpli, c1), cnpi, co(c0, coa, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)))
  addpiord(c0, c1)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), cnpi), wcel(c0, com))
  pinn(c0)
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), cnpi), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), com), wne(co(c0, coa, c1), emptycls))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), com), wcel(c1, com))
  pinn(c1)
  nnacl(c0, c1)
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, cnpi), wne(co(c0, coa, c1), emptycls), wa(wcel(c1, com), wcel(emptycls, c1)))
  elni2(c1)
  imp32(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(emptycls, c1), wne(co(c0, coa, c1), emptycls))
  expcom(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wi(wcel(emptycls, c1), wne(co(c0, coa, c1), emptycls)))
  syl6(wa(wcel(c1, com), wcel(c0, com)), wcel(emptycls, c1), wne(co(c0, coa, c1), emptycls), wcel(co(c0, coa, emptycls), co(c0, coa, c1)))
  nnaordi(c1, c0, emptycls)
  ne0i(co(c0, coa, emptycls), co(c0, coa, c1))
  elni(co(c0, coa, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm addclpi(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℕ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ+)→(c0[+ℕ]c1)∈ ℕ+)
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0[+ℕ]c1), cnpi, (c0[+o]c1), (c0 ∈ ℕ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ+))
  addpiord(c0, c1)
  sylan(c0 ∈ ℕ+, c1 ∈ ℕ+, (c0[+o]c1)∈ ℕ+, c0 ∈ _om)
  pinn(c0)
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ+), (c0[+o]c1)∈ ℕ+, (c0[+o]c1)∈ _om, (c0[+o]c1)≠ ∅)
  sylan2(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ ℕ+, (c0[+o]c1)∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om)
  pinn(c1)
  nnacl(c0, c1)
  sylan2b(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ ℕ+, (c0[+o]c1)≠ ∅, (c1 ∈ _om ∧ ∅ ∈ c1))
  elni2(c1)
  imp32(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om, ∅ ∈ c1, (c0[+o]c1)≠ ∅)
  expcom(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om, (∅ ∈ c1 →(c0[+o]c1)≠ ∅))
  syl6((c1 ∈ _om ∧ c0 ∈ _om), ∅ ∈ c1, (c0[+o]c1)≠ ∅, (c0[+o]∅)∈(c0[+o]c1))
  nnaordi(c1, c0, emptycls)
  ne0i((c0[+o]∅), (c0[+o]c1))
  elni((c0[+o]c1))
}

blocks.name: mulclpi
blocks.content: Closure of multiplication of positive integers. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm mulclpi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wcel(co(c0, cmi, c1), cnpi))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c0, cmi, c1), cnpi, co(c0, comu, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)))
  mulpiord(c0, c1)
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), cnpi), wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), com), wne(co(c0, comu, c1), emptycls))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), com), wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com))
  nnmcl(c0, c1)
  ne0d(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)))
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wcel(co(c0, comu, emptycls), co(c0, comu, c1)), wcel(emptycls, c1))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(emptycls, c1))
  simprbi(wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(emptycls, c1), wcel(c1, com))
  elni2(c1)
  syl21anc(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wi(wcel(emptycls, c1), wcel(co(c0, comu, emptycls), co(c0, comu, c1))), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c0, com), wcel(emptycls, c0))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c1, com))
  pinn(c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c0, com))
  pinn(c0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(emptycls, c0))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(emptycls, c0), wcel(c0, com))
  elni2(c0)
  nnmordi(c1, c0, emptycls)
  elni(co(c0, comu, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mulclpi(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℕ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ+)→(c0[×]c1)∈ ℕ+)
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0[×]c1), cnpi, (c0[×o]c1), (c0 ∈ ℕ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ+))
  mulpiord(c0, c1)
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ ℕ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ+), (c0[×o]c1)∈ ℕ+, (c0[×o]c1)∈ _om, (c0[×o]c1)≠ ∅)
  syl2an(c0 ∈ ℕ+, c1 ∈ ℕ+, (c0[×o]c1)∈ _om, c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om)
  nnmcl(c0, c1)
  ne0d((c0[×o]c1), (c0[×o]∅), (c0 ∈ ℕ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ+))
  mpd((c0 ∈ ℕ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ+), (c0[×o]∅)∈(c0[×o]c1), ∅ ∈ c1)
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℕ+, c1 ∈ ℕ+, ∅ ∈ c1)
  simprbi(c1 ∈ ℕ+, ∅ ∈ c1, c1 ∈ _om)
  elni2(c1)
  syl21anc((c0 ∈ ℕ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ+), (∅ ∈ c1 →(c0[×o]∅)∈(c0[×o]c1)), c1 ∈ _om, c0 ∈ _om, ∅ ∈ c0)
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℕ+, c1 ∈ ℕ+, c1 ∈ _om)
  pinn(c1)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℕ+, c1 ∈ ℕ+, c0 ∈ _om)
  pinn(c0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℕ+, c1 ∈ ℕ+, ∅ ∈ c0)
  simprbi(c0 ∈ ℕ+, ∅ ∈ c0, c0 ∈ _om)
  elni2(c0)
  nnmordi(c1, c0, emptycls)
  elni((c0[×o]c1))
}

  eqtrd(co(c0, cpli, co(c1, cpli, c2)), co(c0, coa, co(c1, coa, c2)), co(c0, coa, co(c1, cpli, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wa(wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi))))

thm distrpi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(co(c0, cmi, co(c1, cpli, c2)), co(co(c0, cmi, c1), cpli, co(c0, cmi, c2)))
} = {

  3eqtr4d(co(c0, cmi, co(c1, cpli, c2)), co(co(c0, cmi, c1), cpli, co(c0, cmi, c2)), co(c0, comu, co(c1, coa, c2)), co(co(c0, comu, c1), coa, co(c0, comu, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi)))

  pinn(c0)
  pinn(c1)
  pinn(c2)
  nndi(c0, c1, c2)
  3impb(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi), wceq(co(c0, cmi, co(c1, cpli, c2)), co(c0, comu, co(c1, coa, c2))))
  eqtrd(co(c0, cmi, co(c1, cpli, c2)), co(c0, comu, co(c1, coa, c2)), co(c0, comu, co(c1, cpli, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wa(wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi))))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cnpi), wa(wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, cmi, co(c1, cpli, c2)), co(c0, comu, co(c1, cpli, c2))), wcel(co(c1, cpli, c2), cnpi))
  addclpi(c1, c2)

  adantl(wcel(c0, cnpi), wa(wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, comu, co(c1, cpli, c2)), co(c0, comu, co(c1, coa, c2))))
  oveq2d(c0, comu, co(c1, cpli, c2), co(c1, coa, c2), wa(wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi)))
  addpiord(c1, c2)
  3impdi(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi), wceq(co(co(c0, cmi, c1), cpli, co(c0, cmi, c2)), co(co(c0, comu, c1), coa, co(c0, comu, c2))))
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, cmi, c1), cpli, co(c0, cmi, c2)), co(co(c0, comu, c1), coa, co(c0, comu, c2)), co(co(c0, cmi, c1), coa, co(c0, cmi, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi))))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmi, c1), cpli, co(c0, cmi, c2)), co(co(c0, cmi, c1), coa, co(c0, cmi, c2))), wcel(co(c0, cmi, c1), cnpi), wcel(co(c0, cmi, c2), cnpi))

  ndmovdistr(c0, cnpi, c1, c2, cmi, cpli)

blocks.name: addcanpi
blocks.content: Addition cancellation law for positive integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-May-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm addcanpi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
} = {
  impbid1(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  pm2.43i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2))), wceq(c1, c2))
  imp4b(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  exp32(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wi(wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
  sylan2(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wa(wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi))), wi(wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, cnpi))
  3syl(wa(wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi))), wcel(c2, cnpi), wcel(co(c0, cpli, c2), cnpi), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi)))
  imp(wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wcel(co(c0, cpli, c2), cnpi))
  syl5ib(wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wcel(co(c0, cpli, c2), cnpi), wcel(co(c0, cpli, c1), cnpi))
  addclpi(c0, c1)
  eleq1(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2), cnpi)
  ndmovrcl(c0, cpli, c2, cnpi)
  dmaddpi()
  0npi()
  simpr(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi))
  sylbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wcel(c2, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2)), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2)))
  eqeq12d(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2), co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wcel(c2, cnpi)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wcel(c2, cnpi), wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, coa, c1)))
  addpiord(c0, c1)
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi), wceq(co(c0, cpli, c2), co(c0, coa, c2)))
  addpiord(c0, c2)
  3expa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi), wi(wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
  syl3an(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi), wi(wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com))
  pinn(c0)
  pinn(c1)
  pinn(c2)
  biimpd(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  nnacan(c0, c1, c2)
  oveq2(c1, c2, c0, cpli)
}

blocks.name: mulcanpi
blocks.content: Multiplication cancellation law for positive integers. (Contributed by NM, 4-Feb-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm mulcanpi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmi, c1), co(c0, cmi, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
} = {
  impbid1(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, cmi, c1), co(c0, cmi, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, cmi, c1), co(c0, cmi, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  pm2.43i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, cmi, c1), co(c0, cmi, c2))), wceq(c1, c2))
  imp4b(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, cmi, c1), co(c0, cmi, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, cmi, c1), co(c0, cmi, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  exp32(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, cmi, c1), co(c0, cmi, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wi(wceq(co(c0, cmi, c1), co(c0, cmi, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
  sylan2(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wa(wceq(co(c0, cmi, c1), co(c0, cmi, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi))), wi(wceq(co(c0, cmi, c1), co(c0, cmi, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, cnpi))
  3syl(wa(wceq(co(c0, cmi, c1), co(c0, cmi, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi))), wcel(c2, cnpi), wcel(co(c0, cmi, c2), cnpi), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi)))
  imp(wceq(co(c0, cmi, c1), co(c0, cmi, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wcel(co(c0, cmi, c2), cnpi))
  syl5ib(wceq(co(c0, cmi, c1), co(c0, cmi, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wcel(co(c0, cmi, c2), cnpi), wcel(co(c0, cmi, c1), cnpi))
  mulclpi(c0, c1)
  eleq1(co(c0, cmi, c1), co(c0, cmi, c2), cnpi)
  ndmovrcl(c0, cmi, c2, cnpi)
  dmmulpi()
  0npi()
  simpr(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi))
  sylbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wcel(c2, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, cmi, c1), co(c0, cmi, c2)), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)))
  eqeq12d(co(c0, cmi, c1), co(c0, cmi, c2), co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wcel(c2, cnpi)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wcel(c2, cnpi), wceq(co(c0, cmi, c1), co(c0, comu, c1)))
  mulpiord(c0, c1)
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi), wceq(co(c0, cmi, c2), co(c0, comu, c2)))
  mulpiord(c0, c2)
  imp31(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi), wi(wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
  pm2.43i(wcel(c0, cnpi), wi(wcel(c1, cnpi), wi(wcel(c2, cnpi), wi(wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))))
  com4r(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi), wi(wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
  3exp(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi), wi(wcel(c0, cnpi), wi(wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))))
  syl3an(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi), wi(wcel(c0, cnpi), wi(wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))), wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com))
  pinn(c0)
  pinn(c1)
  pinn(c2)
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(c0, cnpi), wi(wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
  sylan2(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(c0, cnpi), wi(wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)), wcel(emptycls, c0))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(emptycls, c0), wcel(c0, com))
  elni2(c0)
  biimpd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c0)), wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  nnmcan(c0, c1, c2)
  oveq2(c1, c2, c0, cmi)
}

blocks.name: addnidpi
blocks.content: There is no identity element for addition on positive integers. (Contributed by NM, 28-Nov-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm addnidpi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnpi), wn(wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), c0)))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(wcel(c0, cnpi), wn(wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)))
  a1d(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wcel(c0, cnpi), wn(wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), c0)))
  mtbird(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), c0), wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), c0))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wn(wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), c0)), wcel(c0, com))
  pinn(c0)
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, cnpi), wn(wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), c0)), wa(wcel(c1, com), wcel(emptycls, c1)))
  elni2(c1)
  imp32(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(emptycls, c1), wn(wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), c0)))
  expcom(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wi(wcel(emptycls, c1), wn(wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), c0))))
  syld(wa(wcel(c1, com), wcel(c0, com)), wcel(emptycls, c1), wn(wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), c0)), wcel(co(c0, coa, emptycls), co(c0, coa, c1)))
  nnaordi(c1, c0, emptycls)
  adantl(wcel(c1, com), wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(co(c0, coa, emptycls), co(c0, coa, c1)), wn(wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), c0))))
  sylbid(wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, coa, emptycls), co(c0, coa, c1)), wn(wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), c0)), wcel(c0, co(c0, coa, c1)))
  eleq1d(co(c0, coa, emptycls), co(c0, coa, c1), c0, wcel(c0, com))
  nna0(c0)
  con2d(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c0, co(c0, coa, c1)), wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), c0))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(c0, com), wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), c0), wn(wcel(c0, co(c0, coa, c1))), wn(wcel(c0, c0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, com), wn(wcel(c0, c0)), word(c0))
  nnord(c0)
  ordirr(c0)
  notbid(wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), c0), wcel(c0, co(c0, coa, c1)), wcel(c0, c0))
  eleq2(co(c0, coa, c1), c0, c0)
  eqeq1d(co(c0, cpli, c1), c0, co(c0, coa, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)))
  addpiord(c0, c1)
  con2d(wn(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi))), wcel(c0, cnpi), wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), c0))
  syl6bi(wn(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi))), wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), c0), wn(wcel(c0, cnpi)), wceq(emptycls, c0))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, cpli, c1), c0, emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi))))
  ndmov(c0, cnpi, c1, cpli)
  dmaddpi()
  mtbii(wceq(emptycls, c0), wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(emptycls, cnpi))
  0npi()
  eleq1(emptycls, c0, cnpi)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm addnidpi(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ+ → ¬(c0[+ℕ]c1)= c0)
} = {
  pm2.61i((c0 ∈ ℕ+ → ¬(c0[+ℕ]c1)= c0), (c0 ∈ ℕ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ+))
  a1d((c0 ∈ ℕ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ+), c0 ∈ ℕ+, ¬(c0[+ℕ]c1)= c0)
  mtbird((c0 ∈ ℕ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ+), (c0[+ℕ]c1)= c0, (c0[+o]c1)= c0)
  sylan(c0 ∈ ℕ+, c1 ∈ ℕ+, ¬(c0[+o]c1)= c0, c0 ∈ _om)
  pinn(c0)
  sylan2b(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ ℕ+, ¬(c0[+o]c1)= c0, (c1 ∈ _om ∧ ∅ ∈ c1))
  elni2(c1)
  imp32(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om, ∅ ∈ c1, ¬(c0[+o]c1)= c0)
  expcom(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om, (∅ ∈ c1 → ¬(c0[+o]c1)= c0))
  syld((c1 ∈ _om ∧ c0 ∈ _om), ∅ ∈ c1, ¬(c0[+o]c1)= c0, (c0[+o]∅)∈(c0[+o]c1))
  nnaordi(c1, c0, emptycls)
  adantl(c1 ∈ _om, c0 ∈ _om, ((c0[+o]∅)∈(c0[+o]c1)→ ¬(c0[+o]c1)= c0))
  sylbid(c0 ∈ _om, (c0[+o]∅)∈(c0[+o]c1), ¬(c0[+o]c1)= c0, c0 ∈(c0[+o]c1))
  eleq1d((c0[+o]∅), (c0[+o]c1), c0, c0 ∈ _om)
  nna0(c0)
  con2d(c0 ∈ _om, c0 ∈(c0[+o]c1), (c0[+o]c1)= c0)
  syl5ibrcom(c0 ∈ _om, (c0[+o]c1)= c0, ¬ c0 ∈(c0[+o]c1), ¬ c0 ∈ c0)
  syl(c0 ∈ _om, ¬ c0 ∈ c0, Ord(c0))
  nnord(c0)
  ordirr(c0)
  notbid((c0[+o]c1)= c0, c0 ∈(c0[+o]c1), c0 ∈ c0)
  eleq2((c0[+o]c1), c0, c0)
  eqeq1d((c0[+ℕ]c1), c0, (c0[+o]c1), (c0 ∈ ℕ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ+))
  addpiord(c0, c1)
  con2d(¬(c0 ∈ ℕ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ+), c0 ∈ ℕ+, (c0[+ℕ]c1)= c0)
  syl6bi(¬(c0 ∈ ℕ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ+), (c0[+ℕ]c1)= c0, ¬ c0 ∈ ℕ+, ∅ = c0)
  eqeq1d((c0[+ℕ]c1), c0, emptycls, ¬(c0 ∈ ℕ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ+))
  ndmov(c0, cnpi, c1, cpli)
  dmaddpi()
  mtbii(∅ = c0, c0 ∈ ℕ+, ∅ ∈ ℕ+)
  0npi()
  eleq1(emptycls, c0, cnpi)
}

blocks.name: ltexpi
blocks.content: Ordering on positive integers in terms of existence of sum. (Contributed by NM, 15-Mar-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm ltexpi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wb(wbr(c0, clti, c1), wrex(s0, cnpi, wceq(co(c0, cpli, cv(s0)), c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wbr(c0, clti, c1), wrex(s0, cnpi, wceq(co(c0, cpli, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, com, wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1))))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, com, wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)))), wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com))
  pinn(c0)
  pinn(c1)
  nnaordex(s0, c0, c1)
  ltpiord(c0, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wb(wrex(s0, cnpi, wceq(co(c0, cpli, cv(s0)), c1)), wrex(s0, com, wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)))))
  rexbidv2(s0, cnpi, com, wcel(c0, cnpi), wceq(co(c0, cpli, cv(s0)), c1), wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, cnpi), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cnpi), wceq(co(c0, cpli, cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), com), wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cnpi), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)))
  pm5.32da(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(cv(s0), cnpi), wceq(co(c0, cpli, cv(s0)), c1), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, cpli, cv(s0)), c1, co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(cv(s0), cnpi)))
  addpiord(c0, cv(s0))
  bitri(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cnpi), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), com), wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), com), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0))), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), cnpi), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), com), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0))))
  elni2(cv(s0))
  anass(wcel(cv(s0), com), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cnpi)
  diff.cnpi.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ltapi
blocks.content: Ordering property of addition for positive integers. (Contributed by NM, 7-Mar-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm ltapi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnpi), wb(wbr(c1, clti, c2), wbr(co(c0, cpli, c1), clti, co(c0, cpli, c2))))
} = {
  ndmovord(c0, cnpi, c1, clti, c2, cpli)
  dmaddpi()
  ltrelpi()
  0npi()
  3impa(wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi), wcel(c0, cnpi), wb(wbr(c1, clti, c2), wbr(co(c0, cpli, c1), clti, co(c0, cpli, c2))))
  3bitr4d(wa(wa(wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi)), wcel(c0, cnpi)), wbr(c1, clti, c2), wbr(co(c0, cpli, c1), clti, co(c0, cpli, c2)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2)))
  3expa(wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi), wcel(c0, cnpi), wb(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2))))
  syl3an(wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi), wcel(c0, cnpi), wb(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2))), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com), wcel(c0, com))
  pinn(c1)
  pinn(c2)
  pinn(c0)
  nnaord(c1, c2, c0)
  adantr(wa(wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi)), wcel(c0, cnpi), wb(wbr(c1, clti, c2), wcel(c1, c2)))
  ltpiord(c1, c2)
  ancoms(wa(wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi)), wcel(c0, cnpi), wb(wbr(co(c0, cpli, c1), clti, co(c0, cpli, c2)), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2))))
  anandis(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi), wb(wbr(co(c0, cpli, c1), clti, co(c0, cpli, c2)), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2))))
  bitrd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi))), wbr(co(c0, cpli, c1), clti, co(c0, cpli, c2)), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2)))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi)), wb(wbr(co(c0, cpli, c1), clti, co(c0, cpli, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2))), wcel(co(c0, cpli, c1), cnpi), wcel(co(c0, cpli, c2), cnpi))
  addclpi(c0, c1)
  addclpi(c0, c2)
  ltpiord(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2))
  eleq12d(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, cpli, c2), co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, cpli, c1), co(c0, coa, c1)))
  addpiord(c0, c1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi)), wceq(co(c0, cpli, c2), co(c0, coa, c2)))
  addpiord(c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: ltmpi
blocks.content: Ordering property of multiplication for positive integers. (Contributed by NM, 8-Feb-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm ltmpi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnpi), wb(wbr(c1, clti, c2), wbr(co(c0, cmi, c1), clti, co(c0, cmi, c2))))
} = {
  ndmovord(c0, cnpi, c1, clti, c2, cmi)
  dmmulpi()
  ltrelpi()
  0npi()
  3impa(wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi), wcel(c0, cnpi), wb(wbr(c1, clti, c2), wbr(co(c0, cmi, c1), clti, co(c0, cmi, c2))))
  3bitr4d(wa(wa(wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi)), wcel(c0, cnpi)), wbr(c1, clti, c2), wbr(co(c0, cmi, c1), clti, co(c0, cmi, c2)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)))
  imp(wa(wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi)), wcel(c0, cnpi), wb(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2))))
  syl2an(wcel(c1, cnpi), wcel(c2, cnpi), wi(wcel(c0, cnpi), wb(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)))), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com))
  pinn(c1)
  pinn(c2)

blocks.content: One is less than two (one plus one). (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm 1lt2pi() {

} = {

  nna0(c1o)
  mpbi(wcel(co(c1o, coa, emptycls), co(c1o, coa, c1o)), wcel(emptycls, c1o))
  0lt1o()
  mp3an(wb(wcel(emptycls, c1o), wcel(co(c1o, coa, emptycls), co(c1o, coa, c1o))), wcel(emptycls, com), wcel(c1o, com), wcel(c1o, com))
  peano1()

  nnaord(emptycls, c1o, c1o)
  mp2an(wceq(co(c1o, cpli, c1o), co(c1o, coa, c1o)), wcel(c1o, cnpi), wcel(c1o, cnpi))
  addpiord(c1o, c1o)
  mp2an(wb(wbr(c1o, clti, co(c1o, cpli, c1o)), wcel(c1o, co(c1o, cpli, c1o))), wcel(c1o, cnpi), wcel(co(c1o, cpli, c1o), cnpi))
  mp2an(wcel(co(c1o, cpli, c1o), cnpi), wcel(c1o, cnpi), wcel(c1o, cnpi))
  1pi()
  addclpi(c1o, c1o)
  ltpiord(c1o, co(c1o, cpli, c1o))
}

blocks.name: df-plpq
blocks.content: Define pre-addition on positive fractions. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. This "pre-addition" operation works directly with ordered pairs of integers. The actual positive fraction addition ` +Q ` ( ~ df-plq ) works with the equivalence classes of these ordered pairs determined by the equivalence relation ` ~Q ` ( ~ df-enq ). (Analogous remarks apply to the other "pre-" operations in the complex number construction that follows.) From Proposition 9-2.3 of [Gleason] p. 117. (Contributed by NM, 28-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-mpq
blocks.content: Define pre-multiplication on positive fractions. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. From Proposition 9-2.4 of [Gleason] p. 119. (Contributed by NM, 28-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-ltpq
blocks.content: Define pre-ordering relation on positive fractions. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. Similar to Definition 5 of [Suppes] p. 162. (Contributed by NM, 28-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-enq
blocks.content: Define equivalence relation for positive fractions. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. From Proposition 9-2.1 of [Gleason] p. 117. (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)

axiom df-enq(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {

blocks.name: df-nq
blocks.content: Define class of positive fractions. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. From Proposition 9-2.2 of [Gleason] p. 117. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-erq
blocks.content: Define a convenience function that "reduces" a fraction to lowest terms. Note that in this form, it is not obviously a function; we prove this in ~ nqerf . (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-plq
blocks.content: Define addition on positive fractions. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. From Proposition 9-2.3 of [Gleason] p. 117. (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-mq
blocks.content: Define multiplication on positive fractions. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. From Proposition 9-2.4 of [Gleason] p. 119. (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-1nq
blocks.content: Define positive fraction constant 1. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. From Proposition 9-2.2 of [Gleason] p. 117. (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-rq
blocks.content: Define reciprocal on positive fractions. It means the same thing as one divided by the argument (although we don't define full division since we will never need it). This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. From Proposition 9-2.5 of [Gleason] p. 119, who uses an asterisk to denote this unary operation. (Contributed by NM, 6-Mar-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-ltnq
blocks.content: Define ordering relation on positive fractions. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. Similar to Definition 5 of [Suppes] p. 162. (Contributed by NM, 13-Feb-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: elpqn
blocks.content: Each positive fraction is an ordered pair of positive integers (the numerator and denominator, in "lowest terms". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: ltrelnq
blocks.content: Positive fraction 'less than' is a relation on positive fractions. (Contributed by NM, 14-Feb-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm pinq(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ+ → < c0, 1o > ∈ ℚ+)
} = {
  syl6eleqr(< c0, 1o >, cnq, { hs0 ∈(ℕ+ × ℕ+)| ∀(hs1 ∈(ℕ+ × ℕ+),(hs0[~]hs1 → ¬(2nd ` hs1)[<](2nd ` hs0)))}, c0 ∈ ℕ+)
  elrabd(hs0, < c0, 1o >, (ℕ+ × ℕ+), c0 ∈ ℕ+, ∀(hs1 ∈(ℕ+ × ℕ+),(hs0[~]hs1 → ¬(2nd ` hs1)[<](2nd ` hs0))), ∀(hs1 ∈(ℕ+ × ℕ+),(< c0, 1o >[~]hs1 → ¬(2nd ` hs1)[<](2nd ` < c0, 1o >))))
  ralbidv(hs1, (ℕ+ × ℕ+), hs0 = < c0, 1o >, (hs0[~]hs1 → ¬(2nd ` hs1)[<](2nd ` hs0)), (< c0, 1o >[~]hs1 → ¬(2nd ` hs1)[<](2nd ` < c0, 1o >)))
  imbi12d(hs0 = < c0, 1o >, hs0[~]hs1, ¬(2nd ` hs1)[<](2nd ` hs0), < c0, 1o >[~]hs1, ¬(2nd ` hs1)[<](2nd ` < c0, 1o >))
  breq1(hs0, < c0, 1o >, ceq, hs1)
  notbid(hs0 = < c0, 1o >, (2nd ` hs1)[<](2nd ` hs0), (2nd ` hs1)[<](2nd ` < c0, 1o >))
  breq2d((2nd ` hs1), clti, (2nd ` hs0), (2nd ` < c0, 1o >), hs0 = < c0, 1o >)
  fveq2(hs0, < c0, 1o >, c2nd)
  mpan2(c0 ∈ ℕ+, < c0, 1o > ∈(ℕ+ × ℕ+), 1o ∈ ℕ+)
  1pi()
  opelxpi(c0, cnpi, c1o, cnpi)
  ralrimivw(hs1, (ℕ+ × ℕ+), c0 ∈ ℕ+, (< c0, 1o >[~]hs1 → ¬(2nd ` hs1)[<](2nd ` < c0, 1o >)))
  a1d(c0 ∈ ℕ+, < c0, 1o >[~]hs1, ¬(2nd ` hs1)[<](2nd ` < c0, 1o >))
  mtbiri(c0 ∈ ℕ+, (2nd ` hs1)[<](2nd ` < c0, 1o >), (2nd ` hs1)[<]1o)
  nlt1pi((2nd ` hs1))
  breq2d((2nd ` hs1), clti, (2nd ` < c0, 1o >), c1o, c0 ∈ ℕ+)
  mpan2(c0 ∈ ℕ+, (2nd ` < c0, 1o >)= 1o, 1o ∈ 𝕌)
  1oex()
  op2ndg(c0, cnpi, c1o, universe)
  df-nq(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(< c0, 1o >)
  diff.hs0.c((ℕ+ × ℕ+))
  diff.hs0.w(∀(hs1 ∈(ℕ+ × ℕ+),(< c0, 1o >[~]hs1 → ¬(2nd ` hs1)[<](2nd ` < c0, 1o >))))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 = < c0, 1o >)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈ ℕ+)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}

blocks.name: nqereu
blocks.content: There is a unique element of ` Q. ` equivalent to each element of ` N. X. N. ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

} = {
  mpbir2an((/ℚ :(ℕ+ × ℕ+)→ ℚ+), /ℚ[Fn](ℕ+ × ℕ+), ran(/ℚ)⊆ ℚ+)

  syl(hs0 ∈(ℕ+ × ℕ+), ∃*(hs1,(hs1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ hs1[~]hs0)), ∃!(hs1 ∈ ℚ+, hs1[~]hs0))

  inss1(ceq, ((ℕ+ × ℕ+)× ℚ+))
  dffun6(hs0, hs1, cerq)
  eqssi(dom(/ℚ), (ℕ+ × ℕ+))

blocks.name: nqerrel
blocks.content: Any member of ` ( N. X. N. ) ` relates to the representative of its equivalence class. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm nqerrel(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wbr(c0, ceq, cfv(cerq, c0)))
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wbr(c0, ceq, cfv(cerq, c0)), wbr(c0, cerq, cfv(cerq, c0)))
  mpbii(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wbr(c0, cerq, cfv(cerq, c0)), wceq(cfv(cerq, c0), cfv(cerq, c0)))
  eqid(cfv(cerq, c0))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wb(wceq(cfv(cerq, c0), cfv(cerq, c0)), wbr(c0, cerq, cfv(cerq, c0))), wfn(cerq, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)))
  ax-mp(wfn(cerq, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wf(cerq, cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cnq))
  nqerf()
  ffn(cerq, cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cnq)
  fnbrfvb(cerq, cxp(cnpi, cnpi), c0, cfv(cerq, c0))
  ssbri(c0, cerq, cfv(cerq, c0), ceq)
  eqsstri(cerq, ceq, cin(ceq, cxp(cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cnq)))
  df-erq()
  inss1(ceq, cxp(cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cnq))
}

blocks.name: nqerid
blocks.content: Corollary of ~ nqereu : the function ` /Q ` acts as the identity on members of ` Q. ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nqerid(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnq), wceq(cfv(cerq, c0), c0))
} = {
  mpsyl(wcel(c0, cnq), wceq(cfv(cerq, c0), c0), wfun(cerq), wbr(c0, cerq, c0))
  ax-mp(wfun(cerq), wf(cerq, cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cnq))
  nqerf()
  ffun(cerq, cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cnq)
  syl21anbrc(wcel(c0, cnq), wbr(c0, cerq, c0), wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(c0, cnq), wbr(c0, ceq, c0))
  id(wcel(c0, cnq))
  erref(c0, ceq, cxp(cnpi, cnpi), wcel(c0, cnq))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cnq), wer(ceq, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)))
  enqer()
  elpqn(c0)
  bitri(wbr(c0, cerq, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(c0, cnq)), wbr(c0, ceq, c0)), wbr(c0, cin(ceq, cxp(cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cnq)), c0))
  breqi(c0, cerq, c0, cin(ceq, cxp(cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cnq)))
  df-erq()
  brinxp2(c0, ceq, cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cnq, c0)
  funbrfv(cerq, c0, c0)
}

  enqer()
  elpqn(c0)
  bitri(c0[/ℚ]c0, ((c0 ∈(ℕ+ × ℕ+)∧ c0 ∈ ℚ+)∧ c0[~]c0), c0[(~ ⋂((ℕ+ × ℕ+)× ℚ+))]c0)
  breqi(c0, cerq, c0, (~ ⋂((ℕ+ × ℕ+)× ℚ+)))
  df-erq()
  brinxp2(c0, ceq, (ℕ+ × ℕ+), cnq, c0)
  funbrfv(cerq, c0, c0)
}

blocks.name: enqeq
blocks.content: Corollary of ~ nqereu : if two fractions are both reduced and equivalent, then they are equal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm enqeq(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cnq), wcel(c1, cnq), wbr(c0, ceq, c1)), wceq(c0, c1))
} = {
  syl112anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cnq), wcel(c1, cnq), wbr(c0, ceq, c1)), wceq(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cnq), wcel(c1, cnq)), wmo(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cnq), wbr(cv(hs0), ceq, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cnq), wbr(c0, ceq, c1)), wa(wcel(c1, cnq), wbr(c1, ceq, c1)))
  3simpa(wcel(c0, cnq), wcel(c1, cnq), wbr(c0, ceq, c1))
  sylib(w3a(wcel(c0, cnq), wcel(c1, cnq), wbr(c0, ceq, c1)), wmo(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cnq), wbr(cv(hs0), ceq, c1))), wrmo(hs0, cnq, wbr(cv(hs0), ceq, c1)))
  3syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cnq), wcel(c1, cnq), wbr(c0, ceq, c1)), wrmo(hs0, cnq, wbr(cv(hs0), ceq, c1)), wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wreu(hs0, cnq, wbr(cv(hs0), ceq, c1)))
  nqereu(hs0, c1)
  reurmo(hs0, cnq, wbr(cv(hs0), ceq, c1))
  df-rmo(hs0, cnq, wbr(cv(hs0), ceq, c1))
  3simpb(wcel(c0, cnq), wcel(c1, cnq), wbr(c0, ceq, c1))
  jca(w3a(wcel(c0, cnq), wcel(c1, cnq), wbr(c0, ceq, c1)), wcel(c1, cnq), wbr(c1, ceq, c1))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cnq), wcel(c1, cnq), wbr(c0, ceq, c1))
  erref(c1, ceq, cxp(cnpi, cnpi), w3a(wcel(c0, cnq), wcel(c1, cnq), wbr(c0, ceq, c1)))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, cnq), wcel(c1, cnq), wbr(c0, ceq, c1)), wer(ceq, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)))
  enqer()
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cnq), wcel(c1, cnq), wbr(c0, ceq, c1), wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)))
  elpqn(c1)
  moi(hs0, c0, cnq, c1, cnq, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cnq), wbr(cv(hs0), ceq, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cnq), wbr(c0, ceq, c1)), wa(wcel(c1, cnq), wbr(c1, ceq, c1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cnq), wbr(cv(hs0), ceq, c1), wcel(c0, cnq), wbr(c0, ceq, c1))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, cnq)
  breq1(cv(hs0), c0, ceq, c1)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cnq), wbr(cv(hs0), ceq, c1), wcel(c1, cnq), wbr(c1, ceq, c1))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c1, cnq)
  breq1(cv(hs0), c1, ceq, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cnq), wbr(c0, ceq, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c1, cnq), wbr(c1, ceq, c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm enqeq(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c0[~]c1)→ c0 = c1)
} = {
  syl112anc((c0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c0[~]c1), c0 = c1, (c0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℚ+), ∃*(hs0,(hs0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ hs0[~]c1)), (c0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c0[~]c1), (c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c1[~]c1))
  3simpa(c0 ∈ ℚ+, c1 ∈ ℚ+, c0[~]c1)
  sylib((c0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c0[~]c1), ∃*(hs0,(hs0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ hs0[~]c1)), ∃*(hs0 ∈ ℚ+, hs0[~]c1))
  3syl((c0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c0[~]c1), ∃*(hs0 ∈ ℚ+, hs0[~]c1), c1 ∈(ℕ+ × ℕ+), ∃!(hs0 ∈ ℚ+, hs0[~]c1))
  nqereu(hs0, c1)
  reurmo(hs0, cnq, hs0[~]c1)
  df-rmo(hs0, cnq, hs0[~]c1)
  3simpb(c0 ∈ ℚ+, c1 ∈ ℚ+, c0[~]c1)
  jca((c0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c0[~]c1), c1 ∈ ℚ+, c1[~]c1)
  simp2(c0 ∈ ℚ+, c1 ∈ ℚ+, c0[~]c1)
  erref(c1, ceq, (ℕ+ × ℕ+), (c0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c0[~]c1))
  a1i((c0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c0[~]c1), ~[Er](ℕ+ × ℕ+))
  enqer()
  3ad2ant2(c0 ∈ ℚ+, c1 ∈ ℚ+, c0[~]c1, c1 ∈(ℕ+ × ℕ+))
  elpqn(c1)
  moi(hs0, c0, cnq, c1, cnq, (hs0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ hs0[~]c1), (c0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c0[~]c1), (c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c1[~]c1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, hs0 ∈ ℚ+, hs0[~]c1, c0 ∈ ℚ+, c0[~]c1)
  eleq1(hs0, c0, cnq)
  breq1(hs0, c0, ceq, c1)
  anbi12d(hs0 = c1, hs0 ∈ ℚ+, hs0[~]c1, c1 ∈ ℚ+, c1[~]c1)
  eleq1(hs0, c1, cnq)
  breq1(hs0, c1, ceq, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c0[~]c1))
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c1[~]c1))
}

blocks.name: nqereq
blocks.content: The function ` /Q ` acts as a substitute for equivalence classes, and it satisfies the fundamental requirement for equivalence representatives: the representatives are equal iff the members are equivalent. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm nqereq(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wb(wbr(c0, ceq, c1), wceq(cfv(cerq, c0), cfv(cerq, c1))))

  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wbr(c0, ceq, c1), wceq(cfv(cerq, c0), cfv(cerq, c1)))

  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wbr(c0, ceq, c1)), wceq(cfv(cerq, c0), cfv(cerq, c1)), wcel(cfv(cerq, c0), cnq), wcel(cfv(cerq, c1), cnq), wbr(cfv(cerq, c0), ceq, cfv(cerq, c1)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wbr(c0, ceq, c1), wcel(cfv(cerq, c0), cnq))
  nqercl(c0)
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wbr(c0, ceq, c1), wcel(cfv(cerq, c1), cnq))
  nqercl(c1)
  ertrd(cfv(cerq, c0), ceq, cfv(cerq, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wbr(c0, ceq, c1)))
  ertr3d(cfv(cerq, c0), ceq, c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi), c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wbr(c0, ceq, c1)))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wbr(c0, ceq, c1)), wer(ceq, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wbr(c0, ceq, c1), wbr(c0, ceq, cfv(cerq, c0)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wbr(c0, ceq, c1))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wbr(c0, ceq, c1), wbr(c1, ceq, cfv(cerq, c1)))
  enqeq(cfv(cerq, c0), cfv(cerq, c1))
  expr(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wceq(cfv(cerq, c0), cfv(cerq, c1)), wbr(c0, ceq, c1))
  ertr4d(c0, ceq, c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cfv(cerq, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wa(wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wceq(cfv(cerq, c0), cfv(cerq, c1)))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wa(wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wceq(cfv(cerq, c0), cfv(cerq, c1)))), wer(ceq, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)))
  enqer()
  breqtrd(c0, ceq, cfv(cerq, c1), cfv(cerq, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wa(wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wceq(cfv(cerq, c0), cfv(cerq, c1)))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wa(wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wceq(cfv(cerq, c0), cfv(cerq, c1))), wbr(c0, ceq, cfv(cerq, c0)))
  nqerrel(c0)

}

thm addpqnq(class c0, class c1) {

  3eqtrd(cfv(cplq, cop(c0, c1)), cfv(cerq, cfv(cplpq, cop(c0, c1))), cfv(cres(ccom(cerq, cplpq), cxp(cnq, cnq)), cop(c0, c1)), cfv(ccom(cerq, cplpq), cop(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cnq), wcel(c1, cnq)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cnq), wcel(c1, cnq)), wceq(cfv(cplq, cop(c0, c1)), cfv(cres(ccom(cerq, cplpq), cxp(cnq, cnq)), cop(c0, c1))))
  fveq1i(cplq, cop(c0, c1), cres(ccom(cerq, cplpq), cxp(cnq, cnq)))
  df-plq()
  fvresd(ccom(cerq, cplpq), cxp(cnq, cnq), cop(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cnq), wcel(c1, cnq)))
  opelxpi(c0, cnq, c1, cnq)
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, cnq), wcel(c1, cnq)), wceq(cfv(ccom(cerq, cplpq), cop(c0, c1)), cfv(cerq, cfv(cplpq, cop(c0, c1)))), wfn(cplpq, cxp(cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))))
  fnmpt2i(hs0, hs1, cplpq, cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cop(co(co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), cpli, co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)))))
  df-plpq(hs0, hs1)
  opex(co(co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), cpli, co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cnq), wcel(c1, cnq), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)))
  elpqn(c0)
  elpqn(c1)
  opelxpi(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi), c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi))
  fvco2(cplpq, cxp(cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), cop(c0, c1), cerq)
  df-ov(c0, cplq, c1)
  fveq2i(cerq, co(c0, cplpq, c1), cfv(cplpq, cop(c0, c1)))
  df-ov(c0, cplpq, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(cnpi, cnpi))
  diff.hs1.c(cxp(cnpi, cnpi))
}

thm mulpipq2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wceq(co(c0, cmpq, c1), cop(co(cfv(c1st, c0), cmi, cfv(c1st, c1)), co(cfv(c2nd, c0), cmi, cfv(c2nd, c1)))))
} = {
  ovmpt2(hs0, hs1, c0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi), c1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cmpq, cop(co(cfv(c1st, c0), cmi, cfv(c1st, c1)), co(cfv(c2nd, c0), cmi, cfv(c2nd, c1))), cop(co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)))), cop(co(cfv(c1st, c0), cmi, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c2nd, c0), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)))))
  opeq12d(co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c1st, c0), cmi, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c2nd, c0), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1d(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cfv(c1st, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c1st)
  oveq1d(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), cfv(c2nd, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c2nd)
  opeq12d(co(cfv(c1st, c0), cmi, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c2nd, c0), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c1st, c0), cmi, cfv(c1st, c1)), co(cfv(c2nd, c0), cmi, cfv(c2nd, c1)), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oveq2d(cfv(c1st, c0), cmi, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cfv(c1st, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c1, c1st)
  oveq2d(cfv(c2nd, c0), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), cfv(c2nd, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c1, c2nd)
  df-mpq(hs0, hs1)
  opex(co(cfv(c1st, c0), cmi, cfv(c1st, c1)), co(cfv(c2nd, c0), cmi, cfv(c2nd, c1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(cnpi, cnpi))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cop(co(cfv(c1st, c0), cmi, cfv(c1st, c1)), co(cfv(c2nd, c0), cmi, cfv(c2nd, c1))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cxp(cnpi, cnpi))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cop(co(cfv(c1st, c0), cmi, cfv(c1st, c1)), co(cfv(c2nd, c0), cmi, cfv(c2nd, c1))))
}

thm mulpipq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wa(wcel(c2, cnpi), wcel(c3, cnpi))), wceq(co(cop(c0, c1), cmpq, cop(c2, c3)), cop(co(c0, cmi, c2), co(c1, cmi, c3))))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(cop(c0, c1), cmpq, cop(c2, c3)), cop(co(c0, cmi, c2), co(c1, cmi, c3)), cop(co(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c1)), cmi, cfv(c1st, cop(c2, c3))), co(cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c1)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cop(c2, c3)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wa(wcel(c2, cnpi), wcel(c3, cnpi))))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wa(wcel(c2, cnpi), wcel(c3, cnpi)), wceq(co(cop(c0, c1), cmpq, cop(c2, c3)), cop(co(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c1)), cmi, cfv(c1st, cop(c2, c3))), co(cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c1)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cop(c2, c3))))), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)))
  opelxpi(c0, cnpi, c1, cnpi)
  opelxpi(c2, cnpi, c3, cnpi)
  mulpipq2(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3))
  opeq12d(co(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c1)), cmi, cfv(c1st, cop(c2, c3))), co(cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c1)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cop(c2, c3))), co(c0, cmi, c2), co(c1, cmi, c3), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wa(wcel(c2, cnpi), wcel(c3, cnpi))))
  oveqan12d(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c1)), cmi, cfv(c1st, cop(c2, c3)), c0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wa(wcel(c2, cnpi), wcel(c3, cnpi)))
  op1stg(c0, cnpi, c1, cnpi)
  op1stg(c2, cnpi, c3, cnpi)
  oveqan12d(cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c1)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cop(c2, c3)), c1, c3, wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)), wa(wcel(c2, cnpi), wcel(c3, cnpi)))
  op2ndg(c0, cnpi, c1, cnpi)
  op2ndg(c2, cnpi, c3, cnpi)
}

  fnmpt2i(hs0, hs1, cmpq, cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cop(co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)))))

  opex(co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))))

  fveq2i(cerq, co(c0, cmpq, c1), cfv(cmpq, cop(c0, c1)))

thm ordpipq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wbr(cop(c0, c1), cltpq, cop(c2, c3)), wbr(co(c0, cmi, c3), clti, co(c2, cmi, c1)))
} = {
  bitri(wbr(cop(c0, c1), cltpq, cop(c2, c3)), wbr(co(c0, cmi, c3), clti, co(c2, cmi, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wbr(co(c0, cmi, c3), clti, co(c2, cmi, c1))))
  brab(hs0, hs1, cop(c0, c1), cltpq, cop(c2, c3), wa(wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wbr(co(c0, cmi, c3), clti, co(c2, cmi, c1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wbr(co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), clti, co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))))), wa(wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wbr(co(c0, cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), clti, co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cmi, c1))))
  opex(c0, c1)
  opex(c2, c3)
  bitrd(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wbr(co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), clti, co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))))), wa(wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wbr(co(c0, cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), clti, co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cmi, c1))), wa(wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wbr(co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), clti, co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wbr(co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), clti, co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))
  pm5.32da(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wbr(co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), clti, co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)))), wbr(co(c0, cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), clti, co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cmi, c1)))
  breq12d(co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), clti, co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cmi, c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)))))
  oveq1d(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)))))
  sylan9eq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c1), c1st)
  adantr(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c1)), c0))
  sylbi(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c1)), c0), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)))
  op1stg(c0, cnpi, c1, cnpi)
  oveq2d(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)))))
  sylan9eq(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c1), c2nd)
  adantr(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c1)), c1))
  sylbi(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c1)), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cnpi), wcel(c1, cnpi)))
  opelxp(c0, c1, cnpi, cnpi)
  op2ndg(c0, cnpi, c1, cnpi)
  bitrd(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(c2, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wbr(co(c0, cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), clti, co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cmi, c1))), wa(wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wbr(co(c0, cmi, c3), clti, co(c2, cmi, c1))), wa(wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wbr(co(c0, cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), clti, co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cmi, c1))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wbr(co(c0, cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), clti, co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cmi, c1)), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), cop(c2, c3), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))
  pm5.32da(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))), wbr(co(c0, cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), clti, co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cmi, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cmi, c3), clti, co(c2, cmi, c1)))
  breq12d(co(c0, cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), clti, co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cmi, c1), co(c0, cmi, c3), co(c2, cmi, c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)))))
  oveq2d(c0, cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), c3, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)))))
  sylan9eq(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), c3, cfv(c2nd, cop(c2, c3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cxp(cnpi, cnpi))))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), cop(c2, c3), c2nd)
  adantl(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cxp(cnpi, cnpi)), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cop(c2, c3)), c3))

blocks.name: mulassnq
blocks.content: Multiplication of positive fractions is associative. (Contributed by NM, 1-Sep-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-May-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: lterpq
blocks.content: Compatibility of ordering on equivalent fractions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-May-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: halfnq
blocks.content: One-half of any positive fraction exists. Lemma for Proposition 9-2.6(i) of [Gleason] p. 120. (Contributed by NM, 16-Mar-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm nsmallnq(setvar s0, class c0) {

  sylan(wa(wcel(c1, cnq), wceq(co(c0, cplq, cv(hs0)), c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, cv(hs0)), wbr(co(c0, cplq, cv(hs1)), cltq, co(c0, cplq, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cnq))

thm ltbtwnnq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[<]c1 ↔ ∃(s0,(c0[<]s0 ∧ s0[<]c1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbii(c0[<]c1, ∃(s0,(c0[<]s0 ∧ s0[<]c1)))
  mpcom(c0[<]c1, ∃(s0,(c0[<]s0 ∧ s0[<]c1)), c1 ∈ ℚ+)
  simprd(c0[<]c1, c1 ∈ ℚ+, c0 ∈ ℚ+)
  brel(c0, cltq, c1, cnq, cnq)

  ltexnq(hs0, c1, c0)
  exlimdv(hs0, c1 ∈ ℚ+, (c0[+]hs0)= c1, ∃(s0,(c0[<]s0 ∧ s0[<]c1)))

  simprd((c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= c1), hs0 ∈ ℚ+, c0 ∈ ℚ+)
  syl5((c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= c1), hs0 ∈ ℚ+, ∃(s0,(c0[<]s0 ∧ s0[<]c1)), ∃(hs1, hs1[<]hs0))
  nsmallnq(hs1, hs0)
  exlimdv(hs1, (c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= c1), hs1[<]hs0, ∃(s0,(c0[<]s0 ∧ s0[<]c1)))
  ex((c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= c1), hs1[<]hs0, ∃(s0,(c0[<]s0 ∧ s0[<]c1)))
  syl2anc(((c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= c1)∧ hs1[<]hs0), ∃(s0,(c0[<]s0 ∧ s0[<]c1)), c0[<](c0[+]hs1), (c0[+]hs1)[<]c1)
  syl2an((c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= c1), hs1[<]hs0, c0[<](c0[+]hs1), c0 ∈ ℚ+, hs1 ∈ ℚ+)
  simpld(hs1[<]hs0, hs1 ∈ ℚ+, hs0 ∈ ℚ+)
  brel(hs1, cltq, hs0, cnq, cnq)
  ltaddnq(c0, hs1)
  breqtrd((c0[+]hs1), cltq, c1, (c0[+]hs0), ((c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= c1)∧ hs1[<]hs0))
  sylan((c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= c1), hs1[<]hs0, (c0[+]hs1)[<](c0[+]hs0), c0 ∈ ℚ+)
  simpld((c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= c1), c0 ∈ ℚ+, hs0 ∈ ℚ+)
  syl((c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= c1), (c0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℚ+), (c0[+]hs0)∈ ℚ+)
  biimparc(c1 ∈ ℚ+, (c0[+]hs0)= c1, (c0[+]hs0)∈ ℚ+)
  eleq1((c0[+]hs0), c1, cnq)
  ndmovrcl(c0, cplq, hs0, cnq)
  fdmi(cplq, (ℚ+ × ℚ+), cnq)
  addnqf()
  0nnq()
  biimpa(c0 ∈ ℚ+, hs1[<]hs0, (c0[+]hs1)[<](c0[+]hs0))
  ltanq(c0, hs1, hs0)
  simplr(c1 ∈ ℚ+, (c0[+]hs0)= c1, hs1[<]hs0)
  spcev(s0, (c0[+]hs1), (c0[<](c0[+]hs1)∧(c0[+]hs1)[<]c1), (c0[<]s0 ∧ s0[<]c1))
  ovex(c0, cplq, hs1)
  anbi12d(s0 =(c0[+]hs1), c0[<]s0, s0[<]c1, c0[<](c0[+]hs1), (c0[+]hs1)[<]c1)

blocks.name: ltrnq
blocks.content: Ordering property of reciprocal for positive fractions. Proposition 9-2.6(iv) of [Gleason] p. 120. (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm ltrnq(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, cltq, c1), wbr(cfv(crq, c1), cltq, cfv(crq, c0)))

blocks.name: df-np
blocks.content: Define the set of positive reals. A "Dedekind cut" is a partition of the positive rational numbers into two classes such that all the numbers of one class are less than all the numbers of the other. A positive real is defined as the lower class of a Dedekind cut. Definition 9-3.1 of [Gleason] p. 121. (Note: This is a "temporary" definition used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction.) (Contributed by NM, 31-Oct-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-1p
blocks.content: Define the positive real constant 1. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. Definition of [Gleason] p. 122. (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-plp
blocks.content: Define addition on positive reals. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. From Proposition 9-3.5 of [Gleason] p. 123. (Contributed by NM, 18-Nov-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-plp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cpp, cmpo(s0, s1, cnp, cnp, cab(s2, wrex(s3, cv(s0), wrex(s4, cv(s1), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cplq, cv(s4))))))))
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-plp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ⊢ + =(s0 ∈ ℝ+, s1 ∈ ℝ+ ↦ { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ s0, ∃(s4 ∈ s1, s2 =(s3[+]s4)))})
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: df-mp
blocks.content: Define multiplication on positive reals. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. From Proposition 9-3.7 of [Gleason] p. 124. (Contributed by NM, 18-Nov-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-mp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cmp, cmpo(s0, s1, cnp, cnp, cab(s2, wrex(s3, cv(s0), wrex(s4, cv(s1), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cmq, cv(s4))))))))
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-mp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ⊢ × =(s0 ∈ ℝ+, s1 ∈ ℝ+ ↦ { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ s0, ∃(s4 ∈ s1, s2 =(s3[×]s4)))})
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: df-ltp

  ss2abi(hs0, wa(wa(wpss(emptycls, cv(hs0)), wpss(cv(hs0), cnq)), wral(hs2, cv(hs0), wa(wal(hs1, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))), wrex(hs1, cv(hs0), wbr(cv(hs2), cltq, cv(hs1)))))), wss(cv(hs0), cnq))
  ad2antlr(wpss(emptycls, cv(hs0)), wpss(cv(hs0), cnq), wral(hs2, cv(hs0), wa(wal(hs1, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))), wrex(hs1, cv(hs0), wbr(cv(hs2), cltq, cv(hs1))))), wss(cv(hs0), cnq))
  pssss(cv(hs0), cnq)
  df-np(hs0, hs2, hs1)
  df-pw(hs0, cnq)

  raleqbi1dv(s0, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cltq, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wbr(cv(s0), cltq, cv(s1)))), wa(wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cltq, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cltq, cv(s1)))))

blocks.name: prcdnq

thm prcdnq(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wi(wbr(c2, cltq, c1), wcel(c2, c0)))
} = {
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wbr(c2, cltq, c1), wcel(c2, c0))
  pm2.43i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wbr(c2, cltq, c1)), wcel(c2, c0))
  adantll(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0), wbr(c2, cltq, c1), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wbr(c2, cltq, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  sylan2(wcel(c1, c0), wbr(c2, cltq, c1), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wbr(c2, cltq, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(c2, universe))
  brrelex1i(c2, cltq, c1)
  mp2(wrel(cltq), wss(cltq, cxp(cnq, cnq)), wrel(cxp(cnq, cnq)))
  ltrelnq()
  relxp(cnq, cnq)
  relss(cltq, cxp(cnq, cnq))
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c1, c0, c2, universe, wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wbr(c2, cltq, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, c1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, c1))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c1, c0))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  breq2(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), cltq)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wbr(c2, cltq, c1)), wcel(c2, c0))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, c1), wbr(c2, cltq, c1))
  breq1(cv(hs1), c2, cltq, c1)
  eleq1(cv(hs1), c2, c0)
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  19.21bi(hs1, wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wi(wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wal(hs1, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))), wrex(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(hs1))))
  r19.21bi(hs0, c0, wcel(c0, cnp), wa(wal(hs1, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))), wrex(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(hs1)))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cnp), wral(hs0, c0, wa(wal(hs1, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))), wrex(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(hs1))))), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wpss(emptycls, c0), wpss(c0, cnq)))
  elnpi(hs0, hs1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)

  diff.hs1.w(wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wbr(c2, cltq, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

thm prcdnq(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ c0)→(c2[<]c1 → c2 ∈ c0))
} = {
  ex((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ c0), c2[<]c1, c2 ∈ c0)
  pm2.43i(((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ c0)∧ c2[<]c1), c2 ∈ c0)
  adantll(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c1 ∈ c0, c2[<]c1, (((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ c0)∧ c2[<]c1)→ c2 ∈ c0))
  sylan2(c1 ∈ c0, c2[<]c1, (((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ c0)∧ c2[<]c1)→ c2 ∈ c0), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  brrelex1i(c2, cltq, c1)
  mp2(Rel(<), < ⊆(ℚ+ × ℚ+), Rel((ℚ+ × ℚ+)))
  ltrelnq()
  relxp(cnq, cnq)
  relss(cltq, (ℚ+ × ℚ+))
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c1, c0, c2, universe, (((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ c0)∧ c2[<]c1)→ c2 ∈ c0), (((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)∧ hs1[<]hs0)→ hs1 ∈ c0), (((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ c0)∧ hs1[<]c1)→ hs1 ∈ c0))
  imbi1d(hs0 = c1, ((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)∧ hs1[<]hs0), hs1 ∈ c0, ((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ c0)∧ hs1[<]c1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c1, (c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), hs1[<]hs0, (c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ c0), hs1[<]c1)
  anbi2d(hs0 = c1, c0 ∈ ℝ+, hs0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c0)
  eleq1(hs0, c1, c0)
  breq2(hs0, c1, hs1, cltq)
  imbi12d(hs1 = c2, ((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ c0)∧ hs1[<]c1), hs1 ∈ c0, ((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ c0)∧ c2[<]c1), c2 ∈ c0)
  anbi2d(hs1 = c2, (c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ c0), hs1[<]c1, c2[<]c1)
  breq1(hs1, c2, cltq, c1)
  eleq1(hs1, c2, c0)
  imp((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), hs1[<]hs0, hs1 ∈ c0)
  19.21bi(hs1, (c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (hs1[<]hs0 → hs1 ∈ c0))
  simpld((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), ∀(hs1,(hs1[<]hs0 → hs1 ∈ c0)), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0[<]hs1))

blocks.name: prub
blocks.content: A positive fraction not in a positive real is an upper bound. Remark (1) of [Gleason] p. 122. (Contributed by NM, 25-Feb-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm prub(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, cnq)), wi(wn(wcel(c2, c0)), wbr(c1, cltq, c2)))
} = {
  sylibrd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, cnq)), wn(wcel(c2, c0)), wbr(c1, cltq, c2), wn(wo(wceq(c1, c2), wbr(c2, cltq, c1))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, cnq), wi(wn(wcel(c2, c0)), wn(wo(wceq(c1, c2), wbr(c2, cltq, c1)))))
  con3d(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, c0), wo(wceq(c1, c2), wbr(c2, cltq, c1)))
  jaod(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wceq(c1, c2), wbr(c2, cltq, c1), wcel(c2, c0))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0), wi(wceq(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0)))
  biimpcd(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0))
  eleq1(c1, c2, c0)
  prcdnq(c0, c1, c2)
  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, cnq), wb(wbr(c1, cltq, c2), wn(wo(wceq(c1, c2), wbr(c2, cltq, c1)))), wcel(c1, cnq))
  elprnq(c0, c1)
  mpan(wa(wcel(c1, cnq), wcel(c2, cnq)), wb(wbr(c1, cltq, c2), wn(wo(wceq(c1, c2), wbr(c2, cltq, c1)))), wor(cltq, cnq))
  ltsonq()
  sotric(cltq, cnq, c1, c2)
}

thm prub(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ c0)∧ c2 ∈ ℚ+)→(¬ c2 ∈ c0 → c1[<]c2))
} = {
  sylibrd(((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ c0)∧ c2 ∈ ℚ+), ¬ c2 ∈ c0, c1[<]c2, ¬(c1 = c2 ∨ c2[<]c1))
  adantr((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ c0), c2 ∈ ℚ+, (¬ c2 ∈ c0 → ¬(c1 = c2 ∨ c2[<]c1)))
  con3d((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ c0), c2 ∈ c0, (c1 = c2 ∨ c2[<]c1))
  jaod((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ c0), c1 = c2, c2[<]c1, c2 ∈ c0)
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c1 ∈ c0, (c1 = c2 → c2 ∈ c0))
  biimpcd(c1 ∈ c0, c1 = c2, c2 ∈ c0)
  eleq1(c1, c2, c0)
  prcdnq(c0, c1, c2)
  sylan((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ c0), c2 ∈ ℚ+, (c1[<]c2 ↔ ¬(c1 = c2 ∨ c2[<]c1)), c1 ∈ ℚ+)
  elprnq(c0, c1)
  mpan((c1 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ c2 ∈ ℚ+), (c1[<]c2 ↔ ¬(c1 = c2 ∨ c2[<]c1)), < ≺ ℚ+)
  ltsonq()
  sotric(cltq, cnq, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: prnmax
blocks.content: A positive real has no largest member. Definition 9-3.1(iii) of [Gleason] p. 121. (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-May-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm prnmax(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cltq, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  anabsi7(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0), wrex(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cltq, cv(s0))))
  vtoclg(hs0, c1, c0, wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cltq, cv(s0)))), wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(s0)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cltq, cv(s0))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c1, c0))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  rexbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cltq, cv(s0)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c1, cltq, cv(s0))
  simprd(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(s0))), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cltq, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  r19.21bi(hs0, c0, wcel(c0, cnp), wa(wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cltq, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wrex(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(s0)))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cnp), wral(hs0, c0, wa(wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cltq, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wrex(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(s0))))), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wpss(emptycls, c0), wpss(c0, cnq)))
  elnpi(hs0, s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cltq, cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

  breq1(hs0, c1, cltq, s0)

  simprbi(c0 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0,(∀(s0,(s0[<]hs0 → s0 ∈ c0))∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0[<]s0))), (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ ∅ ⊊ c0 ∧ c0 ⊊ ℚ+))

blocks.name: npomex
blocks.content: A simplifying observation, and an indication of why any attempt to develop a theory of the real numbers without the Axiom of Infinity is doomed to failure: since every member of ` P. ` is an infinite set, the negation of Infinity implies that ` P. ` , and hence ` RR ` , is empty. (Note that this proof, which used the fact that Dedekind cuts have no maximum, could just as well have used that they have no minimum, since they are downward-closed by ~ prcdnq and ~ nsmallnq ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-May-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm npomex(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(com, universe))
} = {
  sylib(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(com, universe), wne(cfn, universe))
  necomd(cfn, universe, wcel(c0, cnp))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cnp), wne(universe, cfn), wcel(c0, universe), wn(wcel(c0, cfn)))
  elex(c0, cnp)
  mt2d(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c0, cfn), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(hs1)))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, wcel(c0, cnp), wrex(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(hs1))))
  prnmax(hs1, c0, cv(hs0))
  ex(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c0, cfn), wn(wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(hs1))))))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c0, cfn)), wn(wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(hs1))))), wrex(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(hs1))))))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c0, cfn)), wrex(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(hs1))))), wor(cltq, c0), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c0, cfn), wor(cltq, c0))
  mpisyl(wcel(c0, cnp), wor(cltq, c0), wss(c0, cnq), wor(cltq, cnq))
  pssssd(c0, cnq, wcel(c0, cnp))
  prpssnq(c0)
  ltsonq()
  soss(c0, cnq, cltq)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c0, cfn))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls))
  prn0(c0)
  fimax2g(hs0, hs1, cltq, c0)
  bitri(wrex(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(hs1))))), wn(wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(hs1))))), wrex(hs0, c0, wn(wrex(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(hs1))))))
  rexbii(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(hs1)))), wn(wrex(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(hs1)))))
  ralnex(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(hs1)))
  rexnal(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(hs1))))
  nelne1(c0, universe, cfn)
  necon1abii(cfn, universe, wcel(com, universe))
  fineqv()
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cnp))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cltq)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cltq)
}

  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℝ+ → _om ∈ 𝕌)
} = {
  sylib(c0 ∈ ℝ+, _om ∈ 𝕌, Fin ≠ 𝕌)

  syl3anc((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c0 ∈ Fin), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[<]hs1)), < ≺ c0, c0 ∈ Fin, c0 ≠ ∅)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c0 ∈ Fin, < ≺ c0)
  mpisyl(c0 ∈ ℝ+, < ≺ c0, c0 ⊆ ℚ+, < ≺ ℚ+)
  pssssd(c0, cnq, c0 ∈ ℝ+)

  simpr(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c0 ∈ Fin)

  rexbii(hs0, c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[<]hs1), ¬ ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0[<]hs1))
  ralnex(hs1, c0, hs0[<]hs1)
  rexnal(hs0, c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0[<]hs1))
  nelne1(c0, universe, cfn)
  necon1abii(cfn, universe, _om ∈ 𝕌)
  fineqv()
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cltq)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cltq)

blocks.origin:
thm prnmadd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {

  syl5(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(c1, cltq, cv(hs0)), wex(s0, wcel(co(c1, cplq, cv(s0)), c0)), wex(s0, wceq(co(c1, cplq, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  mpd(wbr(c1, cltq, cv(hs0)), wex(s0, wceq(co(c1, cplq, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cnq))
  simprd(wbr(c1, cltq, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cnq), wcel(c1, cnq))

  ltrelnq()
  biimpcd(wbr(c1, cltq, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cnq), wex(s0, wceq(co(c1, cplq, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  ltexnq(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  eximdv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(c1, cplq, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(co(c1, cplq, cv(s0)), c0))
  eleq1a(cv(hs0), c0, co(c1, cplq, cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0,(c1[+]s0)∈ c0))

}

thm genpv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6, setvar s7, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+)→(c0[c2]c1)= { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s0 =(s1[c3]s2)))})
  ⊣ c2 =(s3 ∈ ℝ+, s4 ∈ ℝ+ ↦ { s5 | ∃(s6 ∈ s3, ∃(s7 ∈ s4, s5 =(s6[c3]s7)))})
  ⊣ ((s6 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ s7 ∈ ℚ+)→(s6[c3]s7)∈ ℚ+)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+)→(c2 ∈(c0[c3]c1)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, c2 =(s0[c4]s1)))))
  ⊣ c3 =(s2 ∈ ℝ+, s3 ∈ ℝ+ ↦ { s4 | ∃(s5 ∈ s2, ∃(s6 ∈ s3, s4 =(s5[c4]s6)))})
  ⊣ ((s5 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ s6 ∈ ℚ+)→(s5[c4]s6)∈ ℚ+)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s6)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s5)
  ⊣ d(s1, s6)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s5)
  ⊣ d(s2, s6)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s5)
  ⊣ d(s3, s6)
  ⊣ d(s4, s5)
  ⊣ d(s4, s6)
  ⊣ d(s5, s6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s3, c4)
  ⊣ d(s4, c0)
  ⊣ d(s4, c1)
  ⊣ d(s4, c4)
  ⊣ d(s5, c0)
  ⊣ d(s5, c1)
  ⊣ d(s5, c4)
  ⊣ d(s6, c0)
  ⊣ d(s6, c1)
  ⊣ d(s6, c4)
} = {
  syl6bb((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+), c2 ∈(c0[c3]c1), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, c2 =(s0[c4]s1))), c2 ∈ { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, hs0 =(s0[c4]s1)))})
  eleq2d(c2, (c0[c3]c1), { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, hs0 =(s0[c4]s1)))}, (c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+))
  genpv(hs0, s0, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, s6, c0, c1, c3, c4)
  elab3(hs0, c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, hs0 =(s0[c4]s1))), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, c2 =(s0[c4]s1))))
  rexlimivw(s0, c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, c2 =(s0[c4]s1)), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  rexlimivw(s1, c1, c2 =(s0[c4]s1), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl6eqel(c2, universe, (s0[c4]s1), c2 =(s0[c4]s1))
  id(c2 =(s0[c4]s1))
  ovex(s0, c4, s1)
  2rexbidv(s0, s1, c0, c1, hs0 = c2, hs0 =(s0[c4]s1), c2 =(s0[c4]s1))
  eqeq1(hs0, c2, (s0[c4]s1))
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.hs0.s(s4)
  diff.hs0.s(s5)
  diff.hs0.s(s6)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, c2 =(s0[c4]s1))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: genpprecl
blocks.content: Pre-closure law for general operation on positive reals. (Contributed by NM, 10-Mar-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm genpprecl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp)), wi(wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(co(c2, c4, c3), co(c0, c5, c1))))
  -| wceq(c5, cmpo(s0, s1, cnp, cnp, cab(s2, wrex(s3, cv(s0), wrex(s4, cv(s1), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), c4, cv(s4))))))))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s3), cnq), wcel(cv(s4), cnq)), wcel(co(cv(s3), c4, cv(s4)), cnq))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c1)
  -| diffsc(s4, c4)
} = {
  syl5ibr(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp)), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(co(c2, c4, c3), co(c0, c5, c1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(co(c2, c4, c3), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))))))
  mp3an3(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c1), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(co(c2, c4, c3), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))))), wceq(co(c2, c4, c3), co(c2, c4, c3)))
  eqid(co(c2, c4, c3))
  rspceov(hs0, hs1, c2, c0, c3, c1, co(c2, c4, c3), c4)
  genpelv(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, s2, s3, s4, c0, c1, co(c2, c4, c3), c5, c4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, c4, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(co(c2, c4, c3))
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.hs0.s(s4)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.hs1.s(s3)
  diff.hs1.s(s4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

thm genpprecl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+)→((c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c1)→(c2[c4]c3)∈(c0[c5]c1)))
  ⊣ c5 =(s0 ∈ ℝ+, s1 ∈ ℝ+ ↦ { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ s0, ∃(s4 ∈ s1, s2 =(s3[c4]s4)))})
  ⊣ ((s3 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ s4 ∈ ℚ+)→(s3[c4]s4)∈ ℚ+)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c4)
  ⊣ d(s4, c0)
  ⊣ d(s4, c1)
  ⊣ d(s4, c4)
} = {
  syl5ibr((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+), (c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c1), (c2[c4]c3)∈(c0[c5]c1), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ c1,(c2[c4]c3)=(hs0[c4]hs1))))
  mp3an3(c2 ∈ c0, c3 ∈ c1, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ c1,(c2[c4]c3)=(hs0[c4]hs1))), (c2[c4]c3)=(c2[c4]c3))
  eqid((c2[c4]c3))
  rspceov(hs0, hs1, c2, c0, c3, c1, (c2[c4]c3), c4)
  genpelv(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, s2, s3, s4, c0, c1, (c2[c4]c3), c5, c4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c2[c4]c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((c2[c4]c3))
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.hs0.s(s4)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)

  diff.hs0.c(c5)

}
