thm genpdm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cdm(c0), cxp(cnp, cnp))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, cnp, cnp, cab(s2, wrex(s3, cv(s0), wrex(s4, cv(s1), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), c1, cv(s4))))))))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s3), cnq), wcel(cv(s4), cnq)), wcel(co(cv(s3), c1, cv(s4)), cnq))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s4, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(cdm(c0), cxp(cnp, cnp)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wceq(cdm(c0), cxp(cnp, cnp)), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wceq(cdm(c0), cxp(cnp, cnp)), diffsc(s2, c1))
  a1ii(wceq(cdm(c0), cxp(cnp, cnp)), diffsc(s3, c1))
  a1ii(wceq(cdm(c0), cxp(cnp, cnp)), diffsc(s4, c1))
  mp2b(wceq(cdm(c0), cxp(cnp, cnp)), wral(s0, cnp, wral(s1, cnp, wcel(cab(s2, wrex(s3, cv(s0), wrex(s4, cv(s1), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), c1, cv(s4)))))), universe))), wfn(c0, cxp(cnp, cnp)))
  rgen2a(s0, s1, cnp, wcel(cab(s2, wrex(s3, cv(s0), wrex(s4, cv(s1), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), c1, cv(s4)))))), universe))
  sylancl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cnp), wcel(cv(s1), cnp)), wcel(cab(s2, wrex(s3, cv(s0), wrex(s4, cv(s1), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), c1, cv(s4)))))), universe), wss(cab(s2, wrex(s3, cv(s0), wrex(s4, cv(s1), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), c1, cv(s4)))))), cnq), wcel(cnq, universe))
  abssdv(s2, cnq, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cnp), wcel(cv(s1), cnp)), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wrex(s4, cv(s1), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), c1, cv(s4))))))
  rexlimdvva(s3, s4, cv(s0), cv(s1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cnp), wcel(cv(s1), cnp)), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), c1, cv(s4))), wcel(cv(s2), cnq))
  an4s(wcel(cv(s0), cnp), wcel(cv(s1), cnp), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s4), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), c1, cv(s4))), wcel(cv(s2), cnq)))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cnp), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cnp), wcel(cv(s4), cv(s1))), wi(wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), c1, cv(s4))), wcel(cv(s2), cnq)), wcel(cv(s3), cnq), wcel(cv(s4), cnq))
  elprnq(cv(s0), cv(s3))
  elprnq(cv(s1), cv(s4))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(cv(s3), cnq), wcel(cv(s4), cnq)), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), c1, cv(s4))), wcel(cv(s2), cnq), wcel(co(cv(s3), c1, cv(s4)), cnq))
  eleq1(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), c1, cv(s4)), cnq)
  nqex()
  ssexg(cab(s2, wrex(s3, cv(s0), wrex(s4, cv(s1), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), c1, cv(s4)))))), cnq, universe)
  fnmpt2(s0, s1, cnp, cnp, cab(s2, wrex(s3, cv(s0), wrex(s4, cv(s1), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), c1, cv(s4)))))), universe, c0)
  fndm(c0, cxp(cnp, cnp))
  diff.cnp.s(s1)
  diff.cnq.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(cv(s0), cnp), wcel(cv(s1), cnp))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), cnp)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), cnp)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cnp.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s3, wcel(cv(s0), cnp), wcel(cv(s1), cnp))
  diff.wcel.s(s3, cv(s0), cnp)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, cv(s1), cnp)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.cnp.s(s3)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, cv(s2), cnq)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diff.cnq.s(s3)
  diff.wa.s(s4, wcel(cv(s0), cnp), wcel(cv(s1), cnp))
  diff.wcel.s(s4, cv(s0), cnp)
  diff.cv.s(s4, s0)
  diffss.ex(s4, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s4, cv(s1), cnp)
  diff.cv.s(s4, s1)
  diffss.ex(s4, s1)
  diff.cnp.s(s4)
  diff.wcel.s(s4, cv(s2), cnq)
  diff.cv.s(s4, s2)
  diffss.ex(s4, s2)
  diff.cnq.s(s4)
  diff.cnp.s(s0)
}

thm genpdm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ dom(c0)=(ℝ+ × ℝ+)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ ℝ+, s1 ∈ ℝ+ ↦ { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ s0, ∃(s4 ∈ s1, s2 =(s3[c1]s4)))})
  ⊣ ((s3 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ s4 ∈ ℚ+)→(s3[c1]s4)∈ ℚ+)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
  ⊣ d(s4, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(dom(c0)=(ℝ+ × ℝ+), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii(dom(c0)=(ℝ+ × ℝ+), d(s1, c1))
  a1ii(dom(c0)=(ℝ+ × ℝ+), d(s2, c1))
  a1ii(dom(c0)=(ℝ+ × ℝ+), d(s3, c1))
  a1ii(dom(c0)=(ℝ+ × ℝ+), d(s4, c1))
  mp2b(dom(c0)=(ℝ+ × ℝ+), ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ+, { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ s0, ∃(s4 ∈ s1, s2 =(s3[c1]s4)))} ∈ 𝕌)), c0[Fn](ℝ+ × ℝ+))
  rgen2a(s0, s1, cnp, { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ s0, ∃(s4 ∈ s1, s2 =(s3[c1]s4)))} ∈ 𝕌)
  sylancl((s0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ+), { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ s0, ∃(s4 ∈ s1, s2 =(s3[c1]s4)))} ∈ 𝕌, { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ s0, ∃(s4 ∈ s1, s2 =(s3[c1]s4)))} ⊆ ℚ+, ℚ+ ∈ 𝕌)
  abssdv(s2, cnq, (s0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ+), ∃(s3 ∈ s0, ∃(s4 ∈ s1, s2 =(s3[c1]s4))))
  rexlimdvva(s3, s4, s0, s1, (s0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ+), s2 =(s3[c1]s4), s2 ∈ ℚ+)
  an4s(s0 ∈ ℝ+, s1 ∈ ℝ+, s3 ∈ s0, s4 ∈ s1, (s2 =(s3[c1]s4)→ s2 ∈ ℚ+))
  syl2an((s0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ s3 ∈ s0), (s1 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ s4 ∈ s1), (s2 =(s3[c1]s4)→ s2 ∈ ℚ+), s3 ∈ ℚ+, s4 ∈ ℚ+)
  elprnq(s0, s3)
  elprnq(s1, s4)
  syl5ibrcom((s3 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ s4 ∈ ℚ+), s2 =(s3[c1]s4), s2 ∈ ℚ+, (s3[c1]s4)∈ ℚ+)
  eleq1(s2, (s3[c1]s4), cnq)
  nqex()
  ssexg({ s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ s0, ∃(s4 ∈ s1, s2 =(s3[c1]s4)))}, cnq, universe)
  fnmpt2(s0, s1, cnp, cnp, { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ s0, ∃(s4 ∈ s1, s2 =(s3[c1]s4)))}, universe, c0)
  fndm(c0, (ℝ+ × ℝ+))
  diff.cnp.s(s1)
  diff.cnq.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s2, s0 ∈ ℝ+, s1 ∈ ℝ+)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s0, cnp)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s1, cnp)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cnp.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s3, s0 ∈ ℝ+, s1 ∈ ℝ+)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, s0, cnp)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, s1, cnp)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.cnp.s(s3)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, s2, cnq)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s2)

thm nqpr(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℚ+ → { s0 | s0[<]c0 } ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl21anbrc(c0 ∈ ℚ+, { s0 | s0[<]c0 } ∈ ℝ+, ∅ ⊊ { s0 | s0[<]c0 }, { s0 | s0[<]c0 } ⊊ ℚ+, ∀(hs1 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 },(∀(hs0,(hs0[<]hs1 → hs0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 }))∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 }, hs1[<]hs0))))
  sylibr(c0 ∈ ℚ+, ∅ ⊊ { s0 | s0[<]c0 }, { s0 | s0[<]c0 } ≠ ∅)
  sylibr(c0 ∈ ℚ+, { s0 | s0[<]c0 } ≠ ∅, ∃(s0, s0[<]c0))
  nsmallnq(s0, c0)
  abn0(s0, s0[<]c0)
  0pss({ s0 | s0[<]c0 })
  mpsyl(c0 ∈ ℚ+, { s0 | s0[<]c0 } ⊊ ℚ+, { s0 | s0[<]c0 } ⊆ ℚ+, (c0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 }))
  abssi(s0, cnq, s0[<]c0)
  simpld(s0[<]c0, s0 ∈ ℚ+, c0 ∈ ℚ+)
  brel(s0, cltq, c0, cnq, cnq)
  ancli(c0 ∈ ℚ+, ¬ c0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 })
  mtbiri(c0 ∈ ℚ+, c0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 }, c0[<]c0)
  soirri(c0, cltq, cnq)
  elabg(s0, c0, cnq, s0[<]c0, c0[<]c0)
  breq1(s0, c0, cltq, c0)
  ssnelpss({ s0 | s0[<]c0 }, cnq, c0)
  ralrimiva(hs1, { s0 | s0[<]c0 }, c0 ∈ ℚ+, (∀(hs0,(hs0[<]hs1 → hs0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 }))∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 }, hs1[<]hs0)))
  sylan2b(c0 ∈ ℚ+, hs1 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 }, (∀(hs0,(hs0[<]hs1 → hs0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 }))∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 }, hs1[<]hs0)), hs1[<]c0)
  elab(s0, hs1, s0[<]c0, hs1[<]c0)
  vex(hs1)
  breq1(s0, hs1, cltq, c0)
  jca((c0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ hs1[<]c0), ∀(hs0,(hs0[<]hs1 → hs0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 })), ∃(hs0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 }, hs1[<]hs0))
  alrimiv(hs0, (c0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ hs1[<]c0), (hs0[<]hs1 → hs0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 }))
  syl6ibr((c0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ hs1[<]c0), hs0[<]hs1, hs0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 }, hs0[<]c0)
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℚ+, hs1[<]c0, (hs0[<]hs1 → hs0[<]c0))
  expcom(hs1[<]c0, hs0[<]hs1, hs0[<]c0)
  sotri(hs0, cltq, hs1, c0, cnq)
  ltsonq()
  ltrelnq()
  sylibr((c0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ hs1[<]c0), ∃(hs0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 }, hs1[<]hs0), ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 } ∧ hs1[<]hs0)))
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℚ+, hs1[<]c0, ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 } ∧ hs1[<]hs0)))
  sylbi(hs1[<]c0, ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 } ∧ hs1[<]hs0)), ∃(hs0,(hs1[<]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]c0)))
  ltbtwnnq(hs0, hs1, c0)
  eximi(hs0, (hs1[<]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]c0), (hs0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 } ∧ hs1[<]hs0))
  ancomd((hs1[<]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]c0), hs0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 }, hs1[<]hs0)

  anbi2i(hs1[<]hs0, hs0 ∈ { s0 | s0[<]c0 }, hs0[<]c0)
  elab(s0, hs0, s0[<]c0, hs0[<]c0)

  breq1(s0, hs0, cltq, c0)

  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cltq, c0)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈ ℚ+)

  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ ℚ+ ∧ hs1[<]c0))

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

  diff.cltq.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c({ s0 | s0[<]c0 })
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 | s0[<]c0 })
}

blocks.name: mulclprlem
blocks.content: Lemma to prove downward closure in positive real multiplication. Part of proof of Proposition 9-3.7 of [Gleason] p. 124. (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)

  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cnp), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(cv(s2), cnq)), wi(wbr(cv(s2), cltq, co(cv(s0), cmq, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, cmp, c1)))), diffss(s0, s1))

  sylibd(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cnp), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(cv(s2), cnq)), wbr(cv(s2), cltq, co(cv(s0), cmq, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, cmp, c1)), wcel(co(co(cv(s2), cmq, cfv(crq, cv(s1))), cmq, cv(s1)), co(c0, cmp, c1)))

  syld(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cnp), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(cv(s2), cltq, co(cv(s0), cmq, cv(s1))), wcel(co(co(cv(s2), cmq, cfv(crq, cv(s1))), cmq, cv(s1)), co(c0, cmp, c1)), wcel(co(cv(s2), cmq, cfv(crq, cv(s1))), c0))

  bitri(wrex(hs2, c1, wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs2), cplq, cv(hs1))))), wrex(hs1, c0, wrex(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(hs2))))), wrex(hs2, c1, wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(hs2))))))

thm mulcompr(class c0, class c1) {

  syl6eq(co(c1, cmp, c0), cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, c0, wrex(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cmq, cv(hs2)))))), cab(hs0, wrex(hs2, c1, wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs2), cmq, cv(hs1)))))), wa(wcel(c1, cnp), wcel(c0, cnp)))
  mpv(hs0, hs2, hs1, c1, c0)
  abbii(hs0, wrex(hs2, c1, wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs2), cmq, cv(hs1))))), wrex(hs1, c0, wrex(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cmq, cv(hs2))))))
  bitri(wrex(hs2, c1, wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs2), cmq, cv(hs1))))), wrex(hs1, c0, wrex(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cmq, cv(hs2))))), wrex(hs2, c1, wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cmq, cv(hs2))))))

blocks.content: Lemma for distributive law for positive reals. (Contributed by NM, 2-May-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: distrpr
blocks.content: Multiplication of positive reals is distributive. Proposition 9-3.7(iii) of [Gleason] p. 124. (Contributed by NM, 2-May-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: 1idpr
blocks.content: 1 is an identity element for positive real multiplication. Theorem 9-3.7(iv) of [Gleason] p. 124. (Contributed by NM, 2-Apr-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm ltprord(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp)), wb(wbr(c0, cltp, c1), wpss(c0, c1)))
} = {
  bianabs(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp)), wbr(c0, cltp, c1), wpss(c0, c1))
  brabg(hs0, hs1, c0, cnp, c1, cnp, cltp, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp)), wpss(c0, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), cnp)), wpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), cnp)), wpss(c0, cv(hs1))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), cnp)), wpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), cnp)), wpss(c0, cv(hs1)))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), cnp), wcel(c0, cnp))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, cnp)
  psseq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), cnp)), wpss(c0, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp)), wpss(c0, c1))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), cnp), wcel(c1, cnp))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), c1, cnp)
  psseq2(cv(hs1), c1, c0)
  df-ltp(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)

  diff.hs1.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp)), wpss(c0, c1)))
}

  bianabs((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+), c0[<]c1, c0 ⊊ c1)

  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, (hs0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ+), hs0 ⊊ hs1, (c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ+), c0 ⊊ hs1)

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+)→(c0 ⊊ c1 ∨ c0 = c1 ∨ c1 ⊊ c0))
} = {
  sylibr((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+), (c0 ⊊ c1 ∨ c0 = c1 ∨ c1 ⊊ c0), ((c0 ⊊ c1 ∨ c0 = c1)∨(c1 ⊊ c0 ∨ c1 = c0)))

blocks.name: ltaddpr
blocks.content: The sum of two positive reals is greater than one of them. Proposition 9-3.5(iii) of [Gleason] p. 123. (Contributed by NM, 26-Mar-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:

thm ltexprlem3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℝ+ →(s0 ∈ c1 → ∀(s1,(s1[<]s0 → s1 ∈ c1))))
  ⊣ c1 = { s0 | ∃(s2,(¬ s2 ∈ c2 ∧(s2[+]s0)∈ c0))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ ℝ+ →(s0 ∈ c1 → ∀(s1,(s1[<]s0 → s1 ∈ c1)))), d(s0, c1))

  a1ii((c0 ∈ ℝ+ →(s0 ∈ c1 → ∀(s1,(s1[<]s0 → s1 ∈ c1)))), d(s2, c2))
  alrimdv(s1, c0 ∈ ℝ+, s0 ∈ c1, (s1[<]s0 → s1 ∈ c1))
  com23(c0 ∈ ℝ+, s0 ∈ c1, s1[<]s0, s1 ∈ c1)
  ex(c0 ∈ ℝ+, s1[<]s0, (s0 ∈ c1 → s1 ∈ c1))
  3imtr4g((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ s1[<]s0), s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2,(¬ s2 ∈ c2 ∧(s2[+]s0)∈ c0)), ∃(s2,(¬ s2 ∈ c2 ∧(s2[+]s1)∈ c0)))
  eximdv(s2, (c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ s1[<]s0), (¬ s2 ∈ c2 ∧(s2[+]s0)∈ c0), (¬ s2 ∈ c2 ∧(s2[+]s1)∈ c0))
  anim2d((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ s1[<]s0), ¬ s2 ∈ c2, (s2[+]s0)∈ c0, (s2[+]s1)∈ c0)
  impancom(c0 ∈ ℝ+, s1[<]s0, (s2[+]s0)∈ c0, (s2[+]s1)∈ c0)
  sylbid((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧(s2[+]s0)∈ c0), s1[<]s0, (s2[+]s1)∈ c0, (s2[+]s1)[<](s2[+]s0))
  3syl((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧(s2[+]s0)∈ c0), (s1[<]s0 ↔(s2[+]s1)[<](s2[+]s0)), (s2[+]s0)∈ ℚ+, s2 ∈ ℚ+)
  elprnq(c0, (s2[+]s0))
  simpld((s2[+]s0)∈ ℚ+, s2 ∈ ℚ+, s0 ∈ ℚ+)
  ndmovrcl(s2, cplq, s0, cnq)
  fdmi(cplq, (ℚ+ × ℚ+), cnq)
  addnqf()
  0nnq()
  ltanq(s2, s1, s0)
  prcdnq(c0, (s2[+]s0), (s2[+]s1))
  abeq2i(s0, c1, ∃(s2,(¬ s2 ∈ c2 ∧(s2[+]s0)∈ c0)))
  elab2(s0, s1, c1, ∃(s2,(¬ s2 ∈ c2 ∧(s2[+]s1)∈ c0)), ∃(s2,(¬ s2 ∈ c2 ∧(s2[+]s0)∈ c0)))
  vex(s1)
  exbidv(s2, s0 = s1, (¬ s2 ∈ c2 ∧(s2[+]s0)∈ c0), (¬ s2 ∈ c2 ∧(s2[+]s1)∈ c0))
  anbi2d(s0 = s1, ¬ s2 ∈ c2, (s2[+]s0)∈ c0, (s2[+]s1)∈ c0)
  eleq1d((s2[+]s0), c0, (s2[+]s1), s0 = s1)
  oveq2(s0, s1, s2, cplq)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cnp)
  diff.cnp.s(s1)

  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)

blocks.name: ltexprlem5
blocks.content: Lemma for Proposition 9-3.5(iv) of [Gleason] p. 123. (Contributed by NM, 6-Apr-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm ltexprlem5(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wpss(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, cnp))
  -| wceq(c2, cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wn(wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)), c0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl21anbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wpss(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, cnp), wpss(emptycls, c2), wpss(c2, cnq), wral(s0, c2, wa(wal(hs0, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wrex(hs0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), cltq, cv(hs0))))))
  imp(wcel(c0, cnp), wpss(c1, c0), wpss(emptycls, c2))
  syl6ibr(wcel(c0, cnp), wpss(c1, c0), wpss(emptycls, c2), wne(c2, emptycls))
  ltexprlem1(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  0pss(c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cnp), wpss(c1, c0), wpss(c2, cnq))
  ltexprlem2(s0, s1, c0, c2, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cnp), wpss(c1, c0), wral(s0, c2, wa(wal(hs0, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wrex(hs0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), cltq, cv(hs0))))))
  ralrimiv(s0, c2, wcel(c0, cnp), wa(wal(hs0, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wrex(hs0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), cltq, cv(hs0)))))
  jcad(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wal(hs0, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cltq, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wrex(hs0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), cltq, cv(hs0))))
  ltexprlem3(s0, hs0, s1, c0, c2, c1)
  syl6ibr(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wrex(hs0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), cltq, cv(hs0))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cv(s0), cltq, cv(hs0)))))
  ltexprlem4(s0, hs0, s1, c0, c2, c1)
  df-rex(hs0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), cltq, cv(hs0)))
  elnp(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cnp)
  diff.cnp.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ltexprlem5(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ⊊ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ c2 = { s0 | ∃(s1,(¬ s1 ∈ c1 ∧(s1[+]s0)∈ c0))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl21anbrc((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ⊊ c0), c2 ∈ ℝ+, ∅ ⊊ c2, c2 ⊊ ℚ+, ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(∀(hs0,(hs0[<]s0 → hs0 ∈ c2))∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c2, s0[<]hs0))))
  imp(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c1 ⊊ c0, ∅ ⊊ c2)
  syl6ibr(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c1 ⊊ c0, ∅ ⊊ c2, c2 ≠ ∅)
  ltexprlem1(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  0pss(c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c1 ⊊ c0, c2 ⊊ ℚ+)
  ltexprlem2(s0, s1, c0, c2, c1)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c1 ⊊ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(∀(hs0,(hs0[<]s0 → hs0 ∈ c2))∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c2, s0[<]hs0))))
  ralrimiv(s0, c2, c0 ∈ ℝ+, (∀(hs0,(hs0[<]s0 → hs0 ∈ c2))∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c2, s0[<]hs0)))
  jcad(c0 ∈ ℝ+, s0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs0,(hs0[<]s0 → hs0 ∈ c2)), ∃(hs0 ∈ c2, s0[<]hs0))
  ltexprlem3(s0, hs0, s1, c0, c2, c1)
  syl6ibr(c0 ∈ ℝ+, s0 ∈ c2, ∃(hs0 ∈ c2, s0[<]hs0), ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ s0[<]hs0)))
  ltexprlem4(s0, hs0, s1, c0, c2, c1)
  df-rex(hs0, c2, s0[<]hs0)
  elnp(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cnp)
  diff.cnp.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm ltexprlem6(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp)), wpss(c0, c1)), wss(co(c0, cpp, c2), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wn(wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  anassrs(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp), wpss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, cpp, c2), c1))
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c0, cpp, c2), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wa(wcel(c1, cnp), wpss(c0, c1))))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wa(wcel(c1, cnp), wpss(c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cpp, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0))))))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cnp), wa(wcel(c1, cnp), wpss(c0, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cpp, c2)), wrex(hs1, c0, wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c2, cnp))
  ltexprlem5(s0, s1, c1, c0, c2)
  genpelv(hs1, s0, hs0, s1, hs2, hs3, hs4, c0, c2, cv(hs0), cpp, cplq)
  df-plp(hs0, s1, hs2, hs3, hs4)
  addclnq(cv(hs3), cv(hs4))
  adantrr(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp), wpss(c0, c1), wi(wrex(hs1, c0, wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  rexlimdvv(hs1, s0, c0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  exp31(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  sylan(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1))
  imp43(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1))
  com23(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1)))
  exp31(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(c1, cnp), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1)))
  syl5bi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(c1, cnp)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1), wex(s1, wa(wn(wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1))))
  abeq2i(s0, c2, wex(s1, wa(wn(wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1))))
  exlimdv(s1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(c1, cnp)), wa(wn(wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1))
  imp4b(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(c1, cnp), wn(wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1))
  com34(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(c1, cnp), wn(wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1))
  exp32(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(c1, cnp), wcel(co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1), wi(wn(wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1)))
  syld(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cnp), wcel(co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1))), wn(wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1), wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, cv(s1)))
  sylan2(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cnp), wcel(co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1)), wi(wn(wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), cnq))
  syl(wa(wcel(c1, cnp), wcel(co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), cnq), wcel(co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)), cnq))
  simpld(wcel(co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)), cnq), wcel(cv(s1), cnq), wcel(cv(s0), cnq))
  prub(c0, cv(hs1), cv(s1))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cnp), wcel(co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1)), wi(wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, cv(s1)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1)))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c1, cnp), wcel(co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, cv(s1)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1), wbr(co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0)), cltq, co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0))))
  3syl(wa(wcel(c1, cnp), wcel(co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)), c1)), wb(wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, cv(s1)), wbr(co(cv(hs1), cplq, cv(s0)), cltq, co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)))), wcel(co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)), cnq), wcel(cv(s0), cnq))
  elprnq(c1, co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)))
  simprd(wcel(co(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0)), cnq), wcel(cv(s0), cnq), wcel(cv(s1), cnq))
  ndmovrcl(cv(s1), cplq, cv(s0), cnq)
  fdmi(cplq, cxp(cnq, cnq), cnq)
  addnqf()
  0nnq()

thm ltexpri(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[<]c1 → ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ+,(c0[+]s0)= c1))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpcom(c0[<]c1, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ+,(c0[+]s0)= c1), (c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+))
  brel(c0, cltp, c1, cnp, cnp)
  ltrelpr()
  sylbid((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+), c0[<]c1, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ+,(c0[+]s0)= c1), c0 ⊊ c1)
  ltprord(c0, c1)
  ex((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+), c0 ⊊ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ+,(c0[+]s0)= c1))
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+)∧ c0 ⊊ c1), ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ+,(c0[+]s0)= c1), { hs1 | ∃(hs0,(¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs1)∈ c1))} ∈ ℝ+, (c0[+]{ hs1 | ∃(hs0,(¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs1)∈ c1))})= c1)
  adantll(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c1 ∈ ℝ+, c0 ⊊ c1, { hs1 | ∃(hs0,(¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs1)∈ c1))} ∈ ℝ+)
  ltexprlem5(hs2, hs0, c1, c0, { hs1 | ∃(hs0,(¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs1)∈ c1))})
  eqssd((c0[+]{ hs1 | ∃(hs0,(¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs1)∈ c1))}), c1, ((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+)∧ c0 ⊊ c1))
  ltexprlem6(hs2, hs0, c0, c1, { hs1 | ∃(hs0,(¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs1)∈ c1))})
  ltexprlem7(hs2, hs0, c0, c1, { hs1 | ∃(hs0,(¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs1)∈ c1))})
  cbvabv(hs1, hs2, ∃(hs0,(¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs1)∈ c1)), ∃(hs0,(¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs2)∈ c1)))
  exbidv(hs0, hs1 = hs2, (¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs1)∈ c1), (¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs2)∈ c1))
  anbi2d(hs1 = hs2, ¬ hs0 ∈ c0, (hs0[+]hs1)∈ c1, (hs0[+]hs2)∈ c1)
  eleq1d((hs0[+]hs1), c1, (hs0[+]hs2), hs1 = hs2)
  oveq2(hs1, hs2, hs0, cplq)
  rspcev(s0, { hs1 | ∃(hs0,(¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs1)∈ c1))}, cnp, (c0[+]{ hs1 | ∃(hs0,(¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs1)∈ c1))})= c1, (c0[+]s0)= c1)
  eqeq1d((c0[+]s0), c1, (c0[+]{ hs1 | ∃(hs0,(¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs1)∈ c1))}), s0 = { hs1 | ∃(hs0,(¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs1)∈ c1))})
  oveq2(s0, { hs1 | ∃(hs0,(¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs1)∈ c1))}, c0, cpp)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c({ hs1 | ∃(hs0,(¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs1)∈ c1))})
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.w(∃(hs0,(¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs2)∈ c1)))
  diff.hs2.w(∃(hs0,(¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[+]hs1)∈ c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 = hs2)
  diff.cnp.s(s0)

thm ltaprlem(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnp), wi(wbr(c1, cltp, c2), wbr(co(c0, cpp, c1), cltp, co(c0, cpp, c2))))
} = {
  pm2.43b(wcel(c0, cnp), wbr(c1, cltp, c2), wbr(co(c0, cpp, c1), cltp, co(c0, cpp, c2)))
  expd(wbr(c1, cltp, c2), wcel(c0, cnp), wbr(c1, cltp, c2), wbr(co(c0, cpp, c1), cltp, co(c0, cpp, c2)))

  simpld(wbr(c1, cltp, c2), wcel(c1, cnp), wcel(c2, cnp))
  brel(c1, cltp, c2, cnp, cnp)
  ltrelpr()
  syl(wbr(c1, cltp, c2), wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp)), wbr(co(c0, cpp, c1), cltp, co(c0, cpp, c2))), wrex(hs0, cnp, wceq(co(c1, cpp, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  ltexpri(hs0, c1, c2)
  rexlimiv(hs0, cnp, wceq(co(c1, cpp, cv(hs0)), c2), wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp)), wbr(co(c0, cpp, c1), cltp, co(c0, cpp, c2))))
  com3r(wcel(cv(hs0), cnp), wceq(co(c1, cpp, cv(hs0)), c2), wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp)), wbr(co(c0, cpp, c1), cltp, co(c0, cpp, c2)))
  syl5(wceq(co(c1, cpp, cv(hs0)), c2), wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cnp), wbr(co(c0, cpp, c1), cltp, co(c0, cpp, c2))), wcel(co(c0, cpp, c1), cnp))
  addclpr(c0, c1)
  expd(wceq(co(c1, cpp, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(co(c0, cpp, c1), cnp), wcel(cv(hs0), cnp), wbr(co(c0, cpp, c1), cltp, co(c0, cpp, c2)))
  syl5ib(wceq(co(c1, cpp, cv(hs0)), c2), wa(wcel(co(c0, cpp, c1), cnp), wcel(cv(hs0), cnp)), wbr(co(c0, cpp, c1), cltp, co(c0, cpp, c2)), wbr(co(c0, cpp, c1), cltp, co(co(c0, cpp, c1), cpp, cv(hs0))))
  ltaddpr(co(c0, cpp, c1), cv(hs0))
  breq2d(co(c0, cpp, c1), cltp, co(co(c0, cpp, c1), cpp, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cpp, c2), wceq(co(c1, cpp, cv(hs0)), c2))
  syl5eq(co(co(c0, cpp, c1), cpp, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cpp, c2), co(c0, cpp, co(c1, cpp, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c1, cpp, cv(hs0)), c2))
  addasspr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  oveq2(co(c1, cpp, cv(hs0)), c2, c0, cpp)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp)), wbr(co(c0, cpp, c1), cltp, co(c0, cpp, c2))))

blocks.content: Ordering property of addition. Proposition 9-3.5(v) of [Gleason] p. 123. (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm ltapr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnp), wb(wbr(c1, cltp, c2), wbr(co(c0, cpp, c1), cltp, co(c0, cpp, c2))))
} = {
  ndmovord(c0, cnp, c1, cltp, c2, cpp)
  dmplp()

blocks.content: Addition cancellation law for positive reals. Proposition 9-3.5(vi) of [Gleason] p. 123. (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  dmplp()
  0npr()
  exbiri(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp)), wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c2, cnp)), wceq(co(c0, cpp, c1), co(c0, cpp, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  3bitr4d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp)), wa(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c2, cnp))), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(co(c0, cpp, c1), co(c0, cpp, c2)), wn(wo(wbr(c1, cltp, c2), wbr(c2, cltp, c1))), wn(wo(wbr(co(c0, cpp, c1), cltp, co(c0, cpp, c2)), wbr(co(c0, cpp, c2), cltp, co(c0, cpp, c1)))))

  notbid(wcel(c0, cnp), wo(wbr(c1, cltp, c2), wbr(c2, cltp, c1)), wo(wbr(co(c0, cpp, c1), cltp, co(c0, cpp, c2)), wbr(co(c0, cpp, c2), cltp, co(c0, cpp, c1))))
  orbi12d(wcel(c0, cnp), wbr(c1, cltp, c2), wbr(c2, cltp, c1), wbr(co(c0, cpp, c1), cltp, co(c0, cpp, c2)), wbr(co(c0, cpp, c2), cltp, co(c0, cpp, c1)))
  ltapr(c0, c1, c2)
  ltapr(c0, c2, c1)
  ad2ant2l(wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c1, cnp), wcel(c0, cnp), wcel(c2, cnp), wb(wceq(c1, c2), wn(wo(wbr(c1, cltp, c2), wbr(c2, cltp, c1)))))

blocks.name: reclem2pr
blocks.content: Lemma for Proposition 9-3.7 of [Gleason] p. 124. (Contributed by NM, 30-Apr-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm reclem4pr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℝ+ →(c0[×]c1)= 1)
  ⊣ c1 = { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0[<]s1 ∧ ¬(* ` s1)∈ c0))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqssd((c0[×]c1), c1p, c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  ssrdv(hs0, (c0[×]c1), c1p, c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  syl6ibr(c0 ∈ ℝ+, hs0 ∈(c0[×]c1), hs0 ∈ 1, hs0[<]1)
  sylbid(c0 ∈ ℝ+, hs0 ∈(c0[×]c1), hs0[<]1, ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 =(hs1[×]s0))))
  mpdan(c0 ∈ ℝ+, (hs0 ∈(c0[×]c1)↔ ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 =(hs1[×]s0)))), c1 ∈ ℝ+)
  reclem2pr(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  genpelv(hs1, s0, s1, hs0, hs2, hs3, hs4, c0, c1, hs0, cmp, cmq)
  df-mp(s1, hs0, hs2, hs3, hs4)
  mulclnq(hs3, hs4)
  rexlimdvv(hs1, s0, c0, c1, c0 ∈ ℝ+, hs0 =(hs1[×]s0), hs0[<]1)
  expimpd(c0 ∈ ℝ+, hs1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c1, (hs0 =(hs1[×]s0)→ hs0[<]1))
  syl6((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ c0), s0 ∈ c1, (hs0 =(hs1[×]s0)→ hs0[<]1), (hs1[×]s0)[<]1)
  syl5bi((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ c0), s0 ∈ c1, (hs1[×]s0)[<]1, ∃(s1,(s0[<]s1 ∧ ¬(* ` s1)∈ c0)))
  abeq2i(s0, c1, ∃(s1,(s0[<]s1 ∧ ¬(* ` s1)∈ c0)))
  exlimdv(s1, (c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ c0), (s0[<]s1 ∧ ¬(* ` s1)∈ c0), (hs1[×]s0)[<]1)
  impd((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ c0), s0[<]s1, ¬(* ` s1)∈ c0, (hs1[×]s0)[<]1)
  pm2.43d((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ c0), s0[<]s1, (¬(* ` s1)∈ c0 →(hs1[×]s0)[<]1))
  syl5((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ c0), s0[<]s1, (s0[<]s1 →(¬(* ` s1)∈ c0 →(hs1[×]s0)[<]1)), s1 ∈ ℚ+)
  simprd(s0[<]s1, s1 ∈ ℚ+, s0 ∈ ℚ+)
  brel(s0, cltq, s1, cnq, cnq)
  exp4b((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ c0), s1 ∈ ℚ+, s0[<]s1, ¬(* ` s1)∈ c0, (hs1[×]s0)[<]1)
  syl6(((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ ℚ+), (s0[<]s1 ∧ ¬(* ` s1)∈ c0), (hs1[×]s0)[<]1, ((hs1[×]s0)[<](hs1[×]s1)∧(hs1[×]s1)[<]1))
  anim12d(((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ ℚ+), s0[<]s1, ¬(* ` s1)∈ c0, (hs1[×]s0)[<](hs1[×]s1), (hs1[×]s1)[<]1)
  adantr((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ c0), s1 ∈ ℚ+, (s0[<]s1 →(hs1[×]s0)[<](hs1[×]s1)))
  biimpd((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ c0), s0[<]s1, (hs1[×]s0)[<](hs1[×]s1))
  syl((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ c0), (s0[<]s1 ↔(hs1[×]s0)[<](hs1[×]s1)), hs1 ∈ ℚ+)

  jcad(c0 ⊆ ℝ+, s0 ∈ ⋃ c0, ∀(s1,(s1[<]s0 → s1 ∈ ⋃ c0)), ∃(s1 ∈ ⋃ c0, s0[<]s1))
  alrimdv(s1, c0 ⊆ ℝ+, s0 ∈ ⋃ c0, (s1[<]s0 → s1 ∈ ⋃ c0))

  ex(c0 ⊆ ℝ+, s1[<]s0, (s0 ∈ ⋃ c0 → s1 ∈ ⋃ c0))

  ex(wss(c0, cnp), wcel(cv(s0), cnp), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cltp, cuni(c0)), wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cltp, cv(s1)))))

  ssel2(c0, cnp, cv(s1))

  con2bid(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cnp), wcel(cv(s1), cnp)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), cltp, cv(s1)))

blocks.name: supexpr
blocks.content: The union of a nonempty, bounded set of positive reals has a supremum. Part of Proposition 9-3.3 of [Gleason] p. 122. (Contributed by NM, 19-May-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm supexpr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cnp, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, cnp, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), cltp, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cnp, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  syl2anc(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cnp, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, cnp, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), cltp, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cnp, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cv(s2))))))), wcel(cuni(c0), cnp), wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cuni(c0), cltp, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cnp, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cuni(c0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cv(s2)))))))
  suplem1pr(s0, s1, c0)
  syl(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cnp, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cv(s0))))), wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cuni(c0), cltp, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cnp, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cuni(c0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cv(s2)))))), wss(c0, cnp))
  adantl(wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cnp, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cv(s0)))), wss(c0, cnp))
  rexlimivw(s0, cnp, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cv(s0))), wss(c0, cnp))
  sylibr(wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cv(s0))), wss(c0, cnp), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s1), cnp)))
  ralimi(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), cnp))
  simpld(wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), cnp), wcel(cv(s0), cnp))
  brel(cv(s1), cltp, cv(s0), cnp, cnp)
  ltrelpr()
  dfss3(s1, c0, cnp)
  jca(wss(c0, cnp), wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cuni(c0), cltp, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cnp, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cuni(c0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltp, cv(s2))))))
  ralrimiv(s1, c0, wss(c0, cnp), wn(wbr(cuni(c0), cltp, cv(s1))))

blocks.name: nrex1
blocks.content: The class of signed reals is a set. Note that a shorter proof is possible using ~ qsex (and not requiring ~ enrer ), but it would add a dependency on ~ ax-rep . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.) Extract proof from that of ~ axcnex . (Revised by BJ, 4-Feb-2023.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nrex1() {
  |- wcel(cnr, universe)
} = {
  eqeltri(cnr, universe, cqs(cxp(cnp, cnp), cer))
  df-nr()
  ssexi(cqs(cxp(cnp, cnp), cer), cpw(cxp(cnp, cnp)))
  pwex(cxp(cnp, cnp))
  xpex(cnp, cnp)
  npex()
  mptru(wss(cqs(cxp(cnp, cnp), cer), cpw(cxp(cnp, cnp))))
  qsss(cxp(cnp, cnp), cer, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wer(cer, cxp(cnp, cnp)))
  enrer()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nrex1() {
  ⊢ ℝ± ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  eqeltri(cnr, universe, ((ℝ+ × ℝ+)/. ~))
  df-nr()
  ssexi(((ℝ+ × ℝ+)/. ~), P((ℝ+ × ℝ+)))
  pwex((ℝ+ × ℝ+))
  xpex(cnp, cnp)
  npex()
  mptru(((ℝ+ × ℝ+)/. ~)⊆ P((ℝ+ × ℝ+)))
  qsss((ℝ+ × ℝ+), cer, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, ~[Er](ℝ+ × ℝ+))
  enrer()
}

blocks.name: prsrlem1
blocks.content: Decomposing signed reals into positive reals. Lemma for ~ addsrpr and ~ mulsrpr . (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 30-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: addsrmo
blocks.content: There is at most one result from adding signed reals. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 30-Dec-2019.)

blocks.content: There is at most one result from multiplying signed reals. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 30-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: mulsrpr
blocks.content: Multiplication of signed reals in terms of positive reals. (Contributed by NM, 3-Sep-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.content: Signed real 'less than' is a strict ordering. (Contributed by NM, 19-Feb-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: pn0sr
blocks.content: A signed real plus its negative is zero. (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm pn0sr(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnr), wceq(co(c0, cplr, co(c0, cmr, cm1r)), c0r))

  syl5eqr(co(co(c0, cmr, c1r), cplr, co(c0, cmr, cm1r)), c0r, co(c0, cmr, c0r), wcel(c0, cnr))
  3eqtr3i(co(c0, cmr, c0r), co(co(c0, cmr, c1r), cplr, co(c0, cmr, cm1r)), co(c0, cmr, co(cm1r, cplr, c1r)), co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, co(c0, cmr, c1r)))

blocks.content: The square of a nonzero signed real is positive. (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm sqgt0sr(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnr), wne(c0, c0r)), wbr(c0r, cltr, co(c0, cmr, c0)))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, cnr), wne(c0, c0r), wbr(c0r, cltr, co(c0, cmr, c0)))
  sylbird(wcel(c0, cnr), wne(c0, c0r), wbr(c0r, cltr, co(c0, cmr, c0)), wo(wbr(c0, cltr, c0r), wbr(c0r, cltr, c0)))
  necon2abid(c0, c0r, wcel(c0, cnr), wo(wbr(c0, cltr, c0r), wbr(c0r, cltr, c0)))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cnr), wb(wceq(c0, c0r), wn(wo(wbr(c0, cltr, c0r), wbr(c0r, cltr, c0)))), wcel(c0r, cnr))
  0r()
  mpan(wa(wcel(c0, cnr), wcel(c0r, cnr)), wb(wceq(c0, c0r), wn(wo(wbr(c0, cltr, c0r), wbr(c0r, cltr, c0)))), wor(cltr, cnr))
  ltsosr()
  sotrieq(cltr, cnr, c0, c0r)
  jaod(wcel(c0, cnr), wbr(c0, cltr, c0r), wbr(c0r, cltr, c0), wbr(c0r, cltr, co(c0, cmr, c0)))
  sylibd(wcel(c0, cnr), wbr(c0, cltr, c0r), wbr(c0r, cltr, co(c0, cmr, c0)), wbr(c0r, cltr, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cmr, co(c0, cmr, cm1r))))
  syl6bi(wcel(c0, cnr), wbr(c0, cltr, c0r), wbr(c0r, cltr, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cmr, co(c0, cmr, cm1r))), wbr(c0r, cltr, co(c0, cmr, cm1r)))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cnr), wbr(c0, cltr, c0r), wbr(c0r, cltr, co(c0, cmr, cm1r)), wbr(co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c0), cltr, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c0r)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cnr), wb(wbr(c0, cltr, c0r), wbr(co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c0), cltr, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c0r))), wcel(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cnr))
  ltasr(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), c0, c0r)
  breq12d(co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c0), cltr, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c0r), c0r, co(c0, cmr, cm1r), wcel(c0, cnr))
  syl5eq(co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c0), c0r, co(c0, cplr, co(c0, cmr, cm1r)), wcel(c0, cnr))
  addcomsr(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), c0)
  pn0sr(c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, cnr), wceq(co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c0r), co(c0, cmr, cm1r)), wcel(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cnr))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cnr), wcel(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cnr), wcel(cm1r, cnr))
  m1r()
  mulclsr(c0, cm1r)
  0idsr(co(c0, cmr, cm1r))
  anidms(wbr(c0r, cltr, co(c0, cmr, cm1r)), wbr(c0r, cltr, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cmr, co(c0, cmr, cm1r))))
  mulgt0sr(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), co(c0, cmr, cm1r))
  breq2d(c0r, cltr, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cmr, co(c0, cmr, cm1r)), co(c0, cmr, c0), wcel(c0, cnr))
  syl5eq(co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cmr, co(c0, cmr, cm1r)), co(c0, cmr, c0), co(co(c0, cmr, c0), cmr, c1r), wcel(c0, cnr))
  3eqtr4i(co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cmr, co(c0, cmr, cm1r)), co(co(c0, cmr, c0), cmr, c1r), co(c0, cmr, co(cm1r, cmr, co(c0, cmr, cm1r))), co(c0, cmr, co(c0, cmr, c1r)))
  oveq2i(c0, cmr, co(cm1r, cmr, co(c0, cmr, cm1r)), co(c0, cmr, c1r))
  eqtri(co(cm1r, cmr, co(c0, cmr, cm1r)), co(c0, cmr, c1r), co(c0, cmr, co(cm1r, cmr, cm1r)))
  3eqtr3i(co(cm1r, cmr, co(c0, cmr, cm1r)), co(c0, cmr, co(cm1r, cmr, cm1r)), co(co(cm1r, cmr, c0), cmr, cm1r), co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cmr, cm1r))
  oveq1i(co(cm1r, cmr, c0), cmr, cm1r, co(c0, cmr, cm1r))
  mulcomsr(cm1r, c0)
  mulasssr(cm1r, c0, cm1r)
  mulasssr(c0, cm1r, cm1r)
  oveq2i(c0, cmr, co(cm1r, cmr, cm1r), c1r)
  m1m1sr()
  mulasssr(c0, cm1r, co(c0, cmr, cm1r))
  mulasssr(c0, c0, c1r)
  anidms(wcel(c0, cnr), wceq(co(co(c0, cmr, c0), cmr, c1r), co(c0, cmr, c0)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cnr), wcel(c0, cnr)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmr, c0), cmr, c1r), co(c0, cmr, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cmr, c0), cnr))
  mulclsr(c0, c0)
  1idsr(co(c0, cmr, c0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cnr), wi(wbr(c0r, cltr, c0), wbr(c0r, cltr, co(c0, cmr, c0))))
  anidms(wbr(c0r, cltr, c0), wbr(c0r, cltr, co(c0, cmr, c0)))
  mulgt0sr(c0, c0)
}

blocks.name: recexsr
blocks.content: The reciprocal of a nonzero signed real exists. Part of Proposition 9-4.3 of [Gleason] p. 126. (Contributed by NM, 15-May-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm recexsr(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnr), wne(c0, c0r)), wrex(s0, cnr, wceq(co(c0, cmr, cv(s0)), c1r)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  syldan(wcel(c0, cnr), wne(c0, c0r), wrex(s0, cnr, wceq(co(c0, cmr, cv(s0)), c1r)), wbr(c0r, cltr, co(c0, cmr, c0)))
  sqgt0sr(c0)
  impel(wcel(c0, cnr), wbr(c0r, cltr, co(c0, cmr, c0)), wrex(s0, cnr, wceq(co(c0, cmr, cv(s0)), c1r)), wrex(hs0, cnr, wceq(co(co(c0, cmr, c0), cmr, cv(hs0)), c1r)))
  rexlimdva2(hs0, cnr, wcel(c0, cnr), wceq(co(co(c0, cmr, c0), cmr, cv(hs0)), c1r), wrex(s0, cnr, wceq(co(c0, cmr, cv(s0)), c1r)))
  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, cnr), wcel(cv(hs0), cnr)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmr, c0), cmr, cv(hs0)), c1r), wrex(s0, cnr, wceq(co(c0, cmr, cv(s0)), c1r)), wcel(co(c0, cmr, cv(hs0)), cnr))
  mulclsr(c0, cv(hs0))
  sylan2b(wcel(co(c0, cmr, cv(hs0)), cnr), wceq(co(co(c0, cmr, c0), cmr, cv(hs0)), c1r), wrex(s0, cnr, wceq(co(c0, cmr, cv(s0)), c1r)), wceq(co(c0, cmr, co(c0, cmr, cv(hs0))), c1r))
  eqeq1i(co(co(c0, cmr, c0), cmr, cv(hs0)), c1r, co(c0, cmr, co(c0, cmr, cv(hs0))))
  mulasssr(c0, c0, cv(hs0))
  rspcev(s0, co(c0, cmr, cv(hs0)), cnr, wceq(co(c0, cmr, co(c0, cmr, cv(hs0))), c1r), wceq(co(c0, cmr, cv(s0)), c1r))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, cmr, cv(s0)), c1r, co(c0, cmr, co(c0, cmr, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, cmr, cv(hs0))))
  oveq2(cv(s0), co(c0, cmr, cv(hs0)), c0, cmr)
  recexsrlem(hs0, co(c0, cmr, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cnr))
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, cnr, wceq(co(c0, cmr, cv(s0)), c1r)))
  diff.cnr.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(c0, cmr, co(c0, cmr, cv(hs0))), c1r)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmr, co(c0, cmr, cv(hs0)))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmr, cv(hs0))
  diff.cmr.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.c1r.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cmr, c0))
}

blocks.name: mappsrpr
blocks.content: Mapping from positive signed reals to positive reals. (Contributed by NM, 17-May-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm mappsrpr(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wbr(co(c0, cplr, cm1r), cltr, co(c0, cplr, cec(cop(c1, c1p), cer))), wcel(c1, cnp))
  -| wcel(c0, cnr)
} = {
  3bitr3i(wbr(co(c0, cplr, cm1r), cltr, co(c0, cplr, cec(cop(c1, c1p), cer))), wcel(c1, cnp), wbr(cm1r, cltr, cec(cop(c1, c1p), cer)), wbr(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cltp, co(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cpp, c1)))
  bitri(wbr(cm1r, cltr, cec(cop(c1, c1p), cer)), wbr(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cltp, co(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cpp, c1)), wbr(cec(cop(c1p, co(c1p, cpp, c1p)), cer), cltr, cec(cop(c1, c1p), cer)))
  breq1i(cm1r, cltr, cec(cop(c1, c1p), cer), cec(cop(c1p, co(c1p, cpp, c1p)), cer))
  df-m1r()
  ltsrpr(c1p, co(c1p, cpp, c1p), c1, c1p)
  ax-mp(wb(wbr(cm1r, cltr, cec(cop(c1, c1p), cer)), wbr(co(c0, cplr, cm1r), cltr, co(c0, cplr, cec(cop(c1, c1p), cer)))), wcel(c0, cnr))
  ltasr(c0, cm1r, cec(cop(c1, c1p), cer))
  impbii(wbr(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cltp, co(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cpp, c1)), wcel(c1, cnp))
  simpl2im(wbr(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cltp, co(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cpp, c1)), wcel(c1, cnp), wcel(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cnp), wcel(co(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cpp, c1), cnp))
  brel(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cltp, co(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cpp, c1), cnp, cnp)
  ltrelpr()
  simprd(wcel(co(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cpp, c1), cnp), wcel(c1, cnp), wcel(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cnp))
  ndmovrcl(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cpp, c1, cnp)
  dmplp()
  0npr()
  mpan(wcel(c1, cnp), wbr(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cltp, co(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cpp, c1)), wcel(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cnp))
  mp2an(wcel(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cnp), wcel(c1p, cnp), wcel(c1p, cnp))
  1pr()
  addclpr(c1p, c1p)
  ltaddpr(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), c1)
}

blocks.name: ltpsrpr
blocks.content: Mapping of order from positive signed reals to positive reals. (Contributed by NM, 17-May-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm ltpsrpr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wbr(co(c0, cplr, cec(cop(c1, c1p), cer)), cltr, co(c0, cplr, cec(cop(c2, c1p), cer))), wbr(c1, cltp, c2))
  -| wcel(c0, cnr)
} = {
  bitr3i(wbr(co(c0, cplr, cec(cop(c1, c1p), cer)), cltr, co(c0, cplr, cec(cop(c2, c1p), cer))), wbr(c1, cltp, c2), wbr(cec(cop(c1, c1p), cer), cltr, cec(cop(c2, c1p), cer)))
  ax-mp(wb(wbr(cec(cop(c1, c1p), cer), cltr, cec(cop(c2, c1p), cer)), wbr(co(c0, cplr, cec(cop(c1, c1p), cer)), cltr, co(c0, cplr, cec(cop(c2, c1p), cer)))), wcel(c0, cnr))
  ltasr(c0, cec(cop(c1, c1p), cer), cec(cop(c2, c1p), cer))
  3bitr4i(wbr(cec(cop(c1, c1p), cer), cltr, cec(cop(c2, c1p), cer)), wbr(c1, cltp, c2), wbr(co(c1, cpp, c1p), cltp, co(c1p, cpp, c2)), wbr(co(c1p, cpp, c1), cltp, co(c1p, cpp, c2)))
  breq1i(co(c1, cpp, c1p), cltp, co(c1p, cpp, c2), co(c1p, cpp, c1))
  addcompr(c1, c1p)
  ltsrpr(c1, c1p, c2, c1p)
  ax-mp(wb(wbr(c1, cltp, c2), wbr(co(c1p, cpp, c1), cltp, co(c1p, cpp, c2))), wcel(c1p, cnp))
  1pr()
  ltapr(c1p, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: map2psrpr
blocks.content: Equivalence for positive signed real. (Contributed by NM, 17-May-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm map2psrpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wbr(co(c0, cplr, cm1r), cltr, c1), wrex(s0, cnp, wceq(co(c0, cplr, cec(cop(cv(s0), c1p), cer)), c1)))
  -| wcel(c0, cnr)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbii(wbr(co(c0, cplr, cm1r), cltr, c1), wrex(s0, cnp, wceq(co(c0, cplr, cec(cop(cv(s0), c1p), cer)), c1)))
  mpcom(wbr(co(c0, cplr, cm1r), cltr, c1), wrex(s0, cnp, wceq(co(c0, cplr, cec(cop(cv(s0), c1p), cer)), c1)), wcel(c1, cnr))
  simprd(wbr(co(c0, cplr, cm1r), cltr, c1), wcel(c1, cnr), wcel(co(c0, cplr, cm1r), cnr))
  brel(co(c0, cplr, cm1r), cltr, c1, cnr, cnr)
  ltrelsr()
  sylbird(wcel(c1, cnr), wbr(co(c0, cplr, cm1r), cltr, c1), wrex(s0, cnp, wceq(co(c0, cplr, cec(cop(cv(s0), c1p), cer)), c1)), wbr(cm1r, cltr, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1)))
  syl5bb(wcel(c1, cnr), wbr(cm1r, cltr, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cplr, cm1r), cltr, c1), wbr(co(c0, cplr, cm1r), cltr, co(c0, cplr, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1))))
  ax-mp(wb(wbr(cm1r, cltr, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cplr, cm1r), cltr, co(c0, cplr, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1)))), wcel(c0, cnr))
  ltasr(c0, cm1r, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1))
  breq2d(co(c0, cplr, cm1r), cltr, co(c0, cplr, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1)), c1, wcel(c1, cnr))
  syld(wcel(c1, cnr), wbr(cm1r, cltr, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1)), wrex(s0, cnp, wceq(co(c0, cplr, cec(cop(cv(s0), c1p), cer)), c1)), wrex(s0, cnp, wceq(cec(cop(cv(s0), c1p), cer), co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1))))
  syl(wcel(c1, cnr), wi(wbr(cm1r, cltr, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1)), wrex(s0, cnp, wceq(cec(cop(cv(s0), c1p), cer), co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1)))), wcel(co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1), cnr))
  mpan(wcel(c1, cnr), wcel(co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1), cnr), wcel(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cnr))
  mp2an(wcel(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cnr), wcel(c0, cnr), wcel(cm1r, cnr))
  m1r()
  mulclsr(c0, cm1r)
  addclsr(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), c1)
  ecoptocl(hs0, hs1, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1), cnr, cnp, cnp, cer, wi(wbr(cm1r, cltr, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1)), wrex(s0, cnp, wceq(cec(cop(cv(s0), c1p), cer), co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1)))), wi(wbr(cm1r, cltr, cec(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cer)), wrex(s0, cnp, wceq(cec(cop(cv(s0), c1p), cer), cec(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cer)))))
  df-nr()
  imbi12d(wceq(cec(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cer), co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1)), wbr(cm1r, cltr, cec(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cer)), wrex(s0, cnp, wceq(cec(cop(cv(s0), c1p), cer), cec(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cer))), wbr(cm1r, cltr, co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1)), wrex(s0, cnp, wceq(cec(cop(cv(s0), c1p), cer), co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1))))
  breq2(cec(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cer), co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1), cm1r, cltr)
  rexbidv(s0, cnp, wceq(cec(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cer), co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1)), wceq(cec(cop(cv(s0), c1p), cer), cec(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cer)), wceq(cec(cop(cv(s0), c1p), cer), co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1)))
  eqeq2(cec(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cer), co(co(c0, cmr, cm1r), cplr, c1), cec(cop(cv(s0), c1p), cer))
  syl5ibr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cnp), wcel(cv(hs1), cnp)), wbr(cm1r, cltr, cec(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cer)), wrex(s0, cnp, wceq(cec(cop(cv(s0), c1p), cer), cec(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cer))), wrex(s0, cnp, wceq(co(cv(hs1), cpp, cv(s0)), co(c1p, cpp, cv(hs0)))))
  sylbi(wbr(cm1r, cltr, cec(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cer)), wrex(s0, cnp, wceq(co(cv(hs1), cpp, cv(s0)), co(c1p, cpp, cv(hs0)))), wbr(cv(hs1), cltp, co(c1p, cpp, cv(hs0))))
  bitri(wbr(cm1r, cltr, cec(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cer)), wbr(cv(hs1), cltp, co(c1p, cpp, cv(hs0))), wbr(cec(cop(c1p, co(c1p, cpp, c1p)), cer), cltr, cec(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cer)))
  breq1i(cm1r, cltr, cec(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cer), cec(cop(c1p, co(c1p, cpp, c1p)), cer))
  df-m1r()
  3bitr4i(wbr(cec(cop(c1p, co(c1p, cpp, c1p)), cer), cltr, cec(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cer)), wbr(cv(hs1), cltp, co(c1p, cpp, cv(hs0))), wbr(co(c1p, cpp, cv(hs1)), cltp, co(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cpp, cv(hs0))), wbr(co(c1p, cpp, cv(hs1)), cltp, co(c1p, cpp, co(c1p, cpp, cv(hs0)))))
  breq2i(co(c1p, cpp, cv(hs1)), cltp, co(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cpp, cv(hs0)), co(c1p, cpp, co(c1p, cpp, cv(hs0))))
  addasspr(c1p, c1p, cv(hs0))
  ltsrpr(c1p, co(c1p, cpp, c1p), cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  ax-mp(wb(wbr(cv(hs1), cltp, co(c1p, cpp, cv(hs0))), wbr(co(c1p, cpp, cv(hs1)), cltp, co(c1p, cpp, co(c1p, cpp, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c1p, cnp))
  ltapr(c1p, cv(hs1), co(c1p, cpp, cv(hs0)))

blocks.name: supsr
blocks.content: A nonempty, bounded set of signed reals has a supremum. (Contributed by NM, 21-May-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: ltresr2
blocks.content: Ordering of real subset of complex numbers in terms of signed reals. (Contributed by NM, 22-Feb-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: dfcnqs
blocks.content: Technical trick to permit reuse of previous lemmas to prove arithmetic operation laws in ` CC ` from those in ` R. ` . The trick involves ~ qsid , which shows that the coset of the converse epsilon relation (which is not an equivalence relation) acts as an identity divisor for the quotient set operation. This lets us "pretend" that ` CC ` is a quotient set, even though it is not (compare ~ df-c ), and allows us to reuse some of the equivalence class lemmas we developed for the transition from positive reals to signed reals, etc. (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: addcnsrec
blocks.content: Technical trick to permit re-use of some equivalence class lemmas for operation laws. See ~ dfcnqs and ~ mulcnsrec . (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: mulcnsrec
blocks.content: Technical trick to permit re-use of some equivalence class lemmas for operation laws. The trick involves ~ ecid , which shows that the coset of the converse epsilon relation (which is not an equivalence relation) leaves a set unchanged. See also ~ dfcnqs . _Note: This is the last lemma (from which the axioms will be derived) in_ _the construction of real and complex numbers. The construction starts_ _at_ ~ cnpi . (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)
